1938.en:
<voice 00553_00001938><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>You've really come a long
ways, haven't you, <pc>?!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1938.ja:
<voice 00553_00001938><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ずいぶんと　ウデを上げたじゃねえか！
　<pc>！！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1938.ko:
<voice 00553_00001938><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 실력이 많이 늘었는데!
　<pc>!!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1938.zh-Hans:
<voice 00553_00001938><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>厉害了不少嘛！
<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1938.zh-Hant:
<voice 00553_00001938><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>厲害了不少嘛！
<pc>！！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1939.en:
<voice 00570_00001939><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>But guess what?! I'll
be chosen as the Shellner!!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1939.ja:
<voice 00570_00001939><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「だがな！　シェルナーに選ばれるのは
　このオレ　ヒューザさまだぜっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1939.ko:
<voice 00570_00001939><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 하지만! 셸너로 선발되는 건
　바로 나 휴자 님이야!!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1939.zh-Hans:
<voice 00570_00001939><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>不过，要被选为舍纳的，
可是我修萨大人！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1939.zh-Hant:
<voice 00570_00001939><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>不過！要被選為傳貝護者的
可是我修扎大人！！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1940.en: <voice 00780_00001940><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Let's finish this!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1940.ja: <voice 00780_00001940><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「そろそろ　勝負を決めるとするかっ！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1940.ko: <voice 00780_00001940><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 이제 그만 결판을 내 보실까!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1940.zh-Hans: <voice 00780_00001940><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>决出胜负的时刻到了！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1940.zh-Hant: <voice 00780_00001940><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>差不多該分出個勝負了！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1941.en:
<voice 00977_00001941><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Hey, <pc>～! Have you
seen where Aashik ran off to～?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1941.ja:
<voice 00977_00001941><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「ねえ　<pc>～～～！
　アーシクが　どこに行ったか　知らない～？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1941.ko:
<voice 00977_00001941><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: <pc>~~~!
　아시크 어디 갔는지 알아~?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1941.zh-Hans:
<voice 00977_00001941><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>喂，<pc>～～
你知不知道阿西克到哪里去了？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1941.zh-Hant:
<voice 00977_00001941><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>喂，<pc>～～～！
你知道阿西克到哪去了嗎～？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1942.en: <voice 01251_00001942><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Crap, I didn't mean toー!!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1942.ja: <voice 01251_00001942><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「やべえっ　モロに入っちまった！！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1942.ko: <voice 01251_00001942><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 큰일이다, 공격이 정통으로 들어갔어!!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1942.zh-Hans: <voice 01251_00001942><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>糟了，闯祸了！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1942.zh-Hant: <voice 01251_00001942><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>糟糕，闖禍了！！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1943.ja: <voice 01290_00001943><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「きゃああああっ　<pc>っ！！！！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1943.zh-Hans: <voice 01290_00001943><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>呀啊啊啊啊啊，<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1943.zh-Hant: <voice 01290_00001943><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>呀啊啊啊啊，<pc>！！！！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1944.en:
<voice 01955_00001944><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>When our friend <pc> was just
a child, they arrived alone in
this village on a boat.<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1944.ja:
<voice 01955_00001944><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>「我らの友人　<pc>は　幼きころに
　ただひとり　小舟に乗せられ
　このレーンの村へと　流れ着いた。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1944.ko:
<voice 01955_00001944><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>: 우리의 친구 {pc}|hpp(은,는) 어린 시절
　홀로 조각배에 태워져
　이곳 렌 마을에 다다랐습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1944.zh-Hans:
<voice 01955_00001944><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>我们的朋友<pc>年幼时，
只身一人乘着小船来到了雷恩村。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1944.zh-Hant:
<voice 01955_00001944><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>我們的朋友<pc>年幼時，
隻身一人乘著小船
來到了雷恩村。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26950.en:
<voice 02019_00026950><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>Balcha took them in and raised them
at the Fiya Orphanage, where they dreamt of
one day meeting their parents.<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26950.ja:
<voice 02019_00026950><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>「そして　バルチャ老に拾われ
　いつか　生みの親に会うことを　夢に見ながら
　フィーヤ孤児院にて　育った。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26950.ko:
<voice 02019_00026950><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>: 그리고 벌처 영감님께 거둬져
　언젠가 친부모를 만나길 꿈꾸며
　퓌야 고아원에서 자랐습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26950.zh-Hans:
<voice 02019_00026950><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>然后就被巴尔查老爹捡到，
怀抱着有朝一日能见到亲生父母的梦想，
在费娅孤儿院长大。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26950.zh-Hant:
<voice 02019_00026950><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>然後就被巴爾查老爹撿到，
懷抱著有天要見到親生父母的夢想，
在費婭孤兒院長大。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1945.en:
<voice 02044_00001945><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>We believe that the days spent
in this village have brought
<pc> joy and rest...<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1945.ja:
<voice 02044_00001945><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>「この村で送った日々は　<pc>に
　多くの幸福と　そして安息を与えたと
　我らは　信じよう……。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1945.ko:
<voice 02044_00001945><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>: 이 마을에서 보낸 나날이 <pc>에게
　많은 행복과 안식을 주었으리라고
　믿읍시다…….<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1945.zh-Hans:
<voice 02044_00001945><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>我相信在这村子生活的每一天
都带给了<pc>安宁和幸福……<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1945.zh-Hant:
<voice 02044_00001945><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>我們要相信，
在這村子生活的每一天都帶給了<pc>
眾多的幸福與安寧……<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1946.en:
<voice 02213_00001946><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001><pc> now returns to the mother
sea to begin a new journey. Let's
send them off with a smile.<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1946.ja:
<voice 02213_00001946><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>「<pc>は　母なる海へと還り
　新たなる旅立ちを迎える。
　皆で笑って　送りだそうではないか。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1946.ko:
<voice 02213_00001946><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>: {pc}|hpp(은,는) 어머니 바다로 돌아가
　새로운 여행을 떠날 것입니다.
　다 함께 웃으며 배웅합시다.<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1946.zh-Hans:
<voice 02213_00001946><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>今天，<pc>将返回大海母亲的怀抱，
踏上新的旅途。
让我们用笑容送走这位朋友吧。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1946.zh-Hant:
<voice 02213_00001946><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>今天，<pc>將返回大海母親的懷抱，
踏上新的旅途。
讓我們用笑容送走這位朋友吧。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1947.en:
<voice 02323_00001947><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Uugh, <pc>... If I hadn't suddenly called out
to you, this wouldn't have...<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1947.ja:
<voice 02323_00001947><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「ううっ　<pc>……。
　私が急に　声をかけたりしたから
　こんなことに……。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1947.ko:
<voice 02323_00001947><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 으흑, <pc>…….
　내가 갑자기 말을 거는 바람에
　이런…….<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1947.zh-Hans:
<voice 02323_00001947><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>呜呜，<pc>……
都怪我突然大喊大叫
才会这样……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1947.zh-Hant:
<voice 02323_00001947><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>嗚嗚，<pc>……
都怪我突然大喊大叫
才會這樣……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1948.en:
<voice 02454_00001948><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Whoaaaa now, Rubeka sweetie!
Please, don't cry!<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1948.ja:
<voice 02454_00001948><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「わっわっ　ルベカちゃん！
　お願いだから　泣かないで。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1948.ko:
<voice 02454_00001948><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 으앗, 루베카!
　제발 부탁이니 울지 말거라.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1948.zh-Hans:
<voice 02454_00001948><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>哇哇，露贝卡！
求你了，不要哭了。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1948.zh-Hant:
<voice 02454_00001948><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>哇哇，露貝卡！
求妳了，不要哭。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1949.en:
<voice 02606_00001949><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Just when I was about to decide
on the Shellner, this happens. Hyuza...<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1949.ja:
<voice 02606_00001949><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「これから　シェルナーを決めようかという時に
　なんということを。ヒューザ……。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1949.ko:
<voice 02606_00001949><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 셸너 선발을 앞둔 이 시점에
　이게 다 무슨 일이냐, 휴자…….<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1949.zh-Hans:
<voice 02606_00001949><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>在快要决出舍纳的节骨眼上，
你竟然干出这种事，修萨……<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1949.zh-Hant:
<voice 02606_00001949><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>在快要決定出傳貝護者的節骨眼上，
你竟然幹出這種事，修扎……<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1950.en:
<voice 02650_00001950><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>You're not saying I meant to kill them, are you,
Chief? It was only sword practice, after all.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1950.ja:
<voice 02650_00001950><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「オレは殺す気なんて　なかったぜ　村長？
　剣の修行を　してただけだからな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1950.ko:
<voice 02650_00001950><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 나도 죽이려던 건 아니었어, 촌장님.
　검 수련을 했던 것뿐이라고.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1950.zh-Hans:
<voice 02650_00001950><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我根本没打算杀人，村长。
我只想切磋一下剑术而已。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1950.zh-Hant:
<voice 02650_00001950><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我根本沒打算殺人，村長。
我只想切磋一下劍術而已。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1951.en:
<voice 02695_00001951><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Whatever the reason, you took <pc>'s life.
You will pay for it.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1951.ja:
<voice 02695_00001951><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「理由はどうあれ　お前は
　<pc>の命を　うばったのだ。
　つぐないは　してもらうぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1951.ko:
<voice 02695_00001951><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 이유가 뭐든 넌
　<pc>의 목숨을 빼앗았다.
　그 대가는 톡톡히 치러야 할 거다.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1951.zh-Hans:
<voice 02695_00001951><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>不管什么借口，
<pc>都是因你而死的，
你必须要付出代价。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1951.zh-Hant:
<voice 02695_00001951><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>不管理由為何，
<pc>都是因你而死的。
你必須付出代價。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7282.en:
<voice 02883_00007282><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Now, everyone... As Father Raja
was saying, let's send <pc>
back to the mother sea.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7282.ja:
<voice 02883_00007282><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「さあ　みんな……。
　ラージャ神父の　お言葉どおり
　<pc>を　母なる海へ　送りだそう。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7282.ko:
<voice 02883_00007282><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 자, 모두들…….
　라자 신부님의 말씀대로
　{pc}|hpp(을,를) 어머니 바다로 보내 주자.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7282.zh-Hans:
<voice 02883_00007282><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>那么，大伙……
就按照拉伽神父的吩咐，
将<pc>送回大海母亲的怀抱吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7282.zh-Hant:
<voice 02883_00007282><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>來吧，各位……
按照拉伽神父的指示，
送<pc>前往大海母親的懷抱吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1953.ja:
<voice 03739_00001953><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「あわわわ……。
　<pc>が　化けてでたあ！！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1953.ko:
<voice 03739_00001953><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 으아아아…….
　<pc>의 유령이다!!<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1953.zh-Hans:
<voice 03739_00001953><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>哇啊啊！
<pc>诈尸了！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1953.zh-Hant:
<voice 03739_00001953><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>啊哇哇哇……
<pc>變成鬼現身了！！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1954.en:
<voice 03842_00001954><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>...What a surprise. <pc> has
come back to life! Is this a miracle
from the god of the sea?<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1954.ja:
<voice 03842_00001954><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>「……なんということだ。
　<pc>が　生き返った！
　これは　海の神が起こした奇跡なのか！？<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1954.ko:
<voice 03842_00001954><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>: ……이럴 수가.
　{pc}|hpp(이,가) 살아났어!
　이건 바다의 신이 일으킨 기적인가!?<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1954.zh-Hans:
<voice 03842_00001954><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>……怎么回事，
<pc>竟然活过来了！
难道这是海神引发的奇迹吗？！<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1954.zh-Hant:
<voice 03842_00001954><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>……怎麼回事，
<pc>竟然活過來了！
難道這是海神引發的奇蹟嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1955.en:
<voice 04013_00001955><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>They weren't dead!
<pc> wasn't dead!!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1955.ja:
<voice 04013_00001955><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「死んでなかったっ！
　<pc>は　死んでなかったよ！！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1955.ko:
<voice 04013_00001955><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 죽은 게 아니었어!
　{pc}|hpp(은,는) 죽은 게 아니었던 거야!!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1955.zh-Hans:
<voice 04013_00001955><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>还活着！
<pc>还活着呀！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1955.zh-Hant:
<voice 04013_00001955><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>還活著！
<pc>還活著啊！！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1956.en:
<voice 04101_00001956><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Hold up, seriously?! When I checked
their pulse, they were definitely...<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1956.ja:
<voice 04101_00001956><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「おいおいっ　マジかよ！
　あんとき　たしかに　手ごたえが……。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1956.ko:
<voice 04101_00001956><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 맙소사, 진짜야!?
　하지만 손에 느껴진 느낌은…….<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1956.zh-Hans:
<voice 04101_00001956><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>喂喂，真的假的！
那时我确实是砍到你了啊……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1956.zh-Hant:
<voice 04101_00001956><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>喂喂，真的假的！
那時我確實是砍到你了……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1957.en:
<voice 04319_00001957><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Sure enough, you're alive.
It's like another soul
suddenly entered your body...<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1957.ja:
<voice 04319_00001957><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「まちがいねえ。生きてやがる。
　まるで　別の魂が　突然
　身体に　入り込んだみてえだな……。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1957.ko:
<voice 04319_00001957><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 진짜다, 살아 있어.
　마치 갑자기 다른 영혼이
　몸속에 들어가기라도 한 것 같군…….<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1957.zh-Hans:
<voice 04319_00001957><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>没看错，确实还活着呢。
就好像突然被别人的灵魂附了体似的……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1957.zh-Hant:
<voice 04319_00001957><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>不會錯的，確實還活著。
就好像突然被別人的靈魂
附了身似的……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1958.en:
<voice 04567_00001958><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Well, seems like I don't have
to become a murderer after all.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1958.ja:
<voice 04567_00001958><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「なんにしても　オレは
　人殺しにならずに　済んだってわけだ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1958.ko:
<voice 04567_00001958><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 어쨌든 살인자라는
　오명은 피할 수 있게 됐군.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1958.zh-Hans:
<voice 04567_00001958><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>不管怎样，
我没有变成杀人犯。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1958.zh-Hant:
<voice 04567_00001958><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>不管怎樣，
我沒有變成殺人犯。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1959.en:
<voice 04666_00001959><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>I'll be sure to repay
the favor, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1959.ja:
<voice 04666_00001959><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ケガさせちまった借りは
　そのうちに返すぜ　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1959.ko:
<voice 04666_00001959><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 다치게 한 빚은
　조만간 갚으마, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1959.zh-Hans:
<voice 04666_00001959><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>让你受伤了，
我会找机会弥补的，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1959.zh-Hant:
<voice 04666_00001959><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>讓你受傷了，
我會找機會彌補的，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1960.en:
<voice 04720_00001960><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>You need more training if a weak
li'l hit like that nearly offed you.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1960.ja:
<voice 04720_00001960><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「あのくらいで　くたばらないように
　もっと　きたえとけよ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1960.ko:
<voice 04720_00001960><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 그 정도 공격에 죽지 않게
　더 열심히 단련하라고.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1960.zh-Hans:
<voice 04720_00001960><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>你最好也多修炼修炼，
别再轻轻挨一下就倒下了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1960.zh-Hant:
<voice 04720_00001960><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>最好也要多加修練，
別再輕輕挨一下就倒了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1961.en:
<voice 04885_00001961><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Grrrrr, Hyuza... What kind of attitude
is that after almost killing <pc>?!<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1961.es:
<voice 04885_00001961><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Uggh, ese maldito Hyuza. 
　<pc>を　殺しかけておいて
　なんという態度だ！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1961.ja:
<voice 04885_00001961><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「うぬぬ　ヒューザめ。
　<pc>を　殺しかけておいて
　なんという態度だ！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1961.ko:
<voice 04885_00001961><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 끄으응, 휴자 저놈 자식.
　{pc}|hpp(이,가) 죽을 뻔했는데
　저 뻔뻔스러운 태도하고는!<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1961.zh-Hans:
<voice 04885_00001961><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>气死我了，这个修萨。
明明差点就杀死了<pc>，
态度还这么恶劣！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1961.zh-Hant:
<voice 04885_00001961><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>氣死我了，這個修扎。
明明差點就殺死了<pc>，
態度還這麼惡劣！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1962.en:
<voice 04989_00001962><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Dad, you can't blame it all on Hyuza. It's half my
fault after all.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1962.ja:
<voice 04989_00001962><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「お父さん　ヒューザを責めないであげて。
　半分は　私のせいでも　あるんだもん。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1962.ko:
<voice 04989_00001962><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 아빠, 휴자한테 너무 뭐라고 하지 마.
　절반은 내 책임이기도 하니까.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1962.zh-Hans:
<voice 04989_00001962><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>爸爸，就别责怪修萨了。
其实我也有一半的责任。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1962.zh-Hant:
<voice 04989_00001962><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>爸爸，就別責怪修扎了。
其實我也有一半的責任。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1963.en:
<voice 05066_00001963><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Rubekky, there's nothing to worry about. See,
<pc> was fine.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1963.ja:
<voice 05066_00001963><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「ルベカちゃんが　気に病むことはないんだよ。
　ほら　<pc>は　無事だったんだし。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1963.ko:
<voice 05066_00001963><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 루베카 네가 마음 쓸 것 없다.
　결과적으로 {pc}|hpp(은,는) 이렇게 무사하잖니.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1963.zh-Hans:
<voice 05066_00001963><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>露贝卡，你就别自责了。
看，<pc>不是好好的么。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1963.zh-Hant:
<voice 05066_00001963><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>露貝卡用不著自責啊。
妳瞧，<pc>不是好好的嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1964.en:
<voice 05228_00001964><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Well, regardless, you're lucky to be alive.
Seems like I'll have to decide the
role of Shellner after all.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1964.ja:
<voice 05228_00001964><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「まあ　なんにせよ　生きていてよかったな。
　シェルナーは予定どおり　お前と　ヒューザの
　どちらかから　選ぶことにするからな？<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1964.ko:
<voice 05228_00001964><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 뭐, 어쨌든 살아 있어서 다행이구나.
　셸너는 예정대로 너와 휴자 중에서
　선발할 테니 그리 알거라.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1964.zh-Hans:
<voice 05228_00001964><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>算了，总之，你还活着真的太好了。
既然你还活着，
就要按照预定从你和修萨中选出舍纳。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1964.zh-Hant:
<voice 05228_00001964><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>算了，總之，你還活著真的太好了。
既然你還活著，就要按照預定
從你和修扎中選出傳貝護者。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1965.en:
<voice 05374_00001965><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001><pc>'s funeral is cancelled!
Everyone, go home! Go home!!<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1965.ja:
<voice 05374_00001965><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「<pc>の　葬式は中止だ！
　みんなも　家に帰った帰った！！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1965.ko:
<voice 05374_00001965><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: <pc>의 장례식은 취소다!
　다들 집으로 돌아가자고!!<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1965.zh-Hans:
<voice 05374_00001965><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001><pc>的葬礼取消了！
大家都回去吧！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1965.zh-Hant:
<voice 05374_00001965><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001><pc>的葬禮取消了！
大家都回去吧！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1966.en:
<voice 05843_00001966><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>What the—<pc>!? I was shopping when I heard
about your funeral, so I rushed to get back, but...<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1966.ja:
<voice 05843_00001966><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「あれれっ　<pc>！？
　キミの葬式をするって聞いて　あわてて
　買い物から　戻ってきたんだけど……。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1966.ko:
<voice 05843_00001966><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 어라, <pc>!?
　네 장례식을 치른다기에
　물건 사러 갔다가 서둘러 돌아왔는데…….<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1966.zh-Hans:
<voice 05843_00001966><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>啊，<pc>？！
听说要举行你的葬礼，我吓了一跳。
当时我正在买东西，马上就赶了回来……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1966.zh-Hant:
<voice 05843_00001966><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>咦咦，<pc>！？
聽說要舉行你的葬禮，
我買東西買到一半急忙趕回來……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1967.en:
<voice 06012_00001967><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>I misheard, didn't I. What a relief. You are valued
friend, after all.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1967.ja:
<voice 06012_00001967><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「ボクの　聞きまちがいだったんだね。
　ほっとしたよ。キミは　大切な友達だもの。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1967.ko:
<voice 06012_00001967><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 내가 잘못 들은 모양이네.
　다행이야, 넌 네 소중한 친구니까.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1967.zh-Hans:
<voice 06012_00001967><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>看来是我听错了。
那我就放心了。毕竟你是我的好朋友啊。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1967.zh-Hant:
<voice 06012_00001967><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>看來是我聽錯了。
真是鬆了口氣，畢竟你可是我重要的朋友啊。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1968.en:
<voice 06042_00001968><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Besides, my wedding's soon, right? A funeral at a
time like that—oof... That'd be a bad omen, wouldn't it.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1968.ja:
<voice 06042_00001968><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「それに　もうすぐ　ボクの結婚式でしょ？
　そんな時に　葬式なんて
　ほら……　縁起でもないじゃないか。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1968.ko:
<voice 06042_00001968><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 게다가 이제 곧 내 결혼식이잖아?
　이런 시기에 장례식이라니
　아무래도 좀…… 찜찜하잖아?<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1968.zh-Hans:
<voice 06042_00001968><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>而且，再过不久我就要结婚了，
在这种时候举办葬礼，
怎么看都有点不吉利啊。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1968.zh-Hant:
<voice 06042_00001968><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>而且，再過不久我就要結婚了，
在這種時候舉辦葬禮……
怎麼看都有點不吉利啊。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26951.en:
<voice 06062_00026951><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Anyways, remember how you
promised to help me find a shell
for my bride Keel?<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26951.ja:
<voice 06062_00026951><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「でさ。花婿である　このボク　アーシクが
　花嫁のキールに贈る　貝がらを
　一緒に探してくれるって約束　覚えてる？　<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26951.ko:
<voice 06062_00026951><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 그건 그렇고 나, 신랑 아시크가
　신부 키르에게 선물할 조개껍데기를
　같이 찾아주기로 약속한 거 기억해? <stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26951.zh-Hans:
<voice 06062_00026951><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>所以，我这个新郎阿西克
要送贝壳给新娘琪尔的事，
你答应过我要一起找贝壳的，还记得吧？<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26951.zh-Hant:
<voice 06062_00026951><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>話說回來，我這個新郎阿西克
要送給新娘琪兒的貝殼，
之前說好要一起去找的，你還記得嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1969.en:
<voice 06082_00001969><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>There's not much time left. We need
to head to the beach northwest
of the village to look for one.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1969.ja:
<voice 06082_00001969><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「もう時間が　ないんだよ。
　今から　村の北西にある　慰霊の浜に行って
　探そうと思うんだけど……いいよね？<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1969.ko:
<voice 06082_00001969><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 이제 시간이 얼마 없거든. 지금 바로
　마을 북서쪽에 있는 위령의 해변에 가서
　찾아볼까 하는데…… 괜찮지?<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1969.zh-Hans:
<voice 06082_00001969><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>就要没时间了。
待会一起去村子西北方的
慰灵海滨找一找……可以么？<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1969.zh-Hant:
<voice 06082_00001969><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>就要沒時間了。
我打算去村子西北方的
慰靈海灘找一找……沒問題吧？<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1970.en:
<voice 06122_00001970><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>People say the beach is
forbidden, but I'll bet there are tons
of beautiful shells there.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1970.ja:
<voice 06122_00001970><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「慰霊の浜は　入っちゃいけない場所だって
　言われてるけど　その分
　キレイな貝がらが　たくさんあると思うんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1970.ko:
<voice 06122_00001970><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 위령의 해변은
　출입이 금지되어 있긴 하지만
　그만큼 예쁜 조개껍데기가 많을 거야.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1970.zh-Hans:
<voice 06122_00001970><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>据说慰灵海滨是禁地，
但是却散落着许多漂亮的贝壳。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1970.zh-Hant:
<voice 06122_00001970><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>據說慰靈海灘是禁止進入的地區，
正因為如此，應該會有
許多漂亮的貝殼。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1971.en:
<voice 06163_00001971><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>I'll be there as soon as I finish some
errands. Why don't you wait at the
memorial on the beach, <pc>?<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1971.ja:
<voice 06163_00001971><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「ボクも用を済ませて　すぐに行くよ。
　慰霊の浜にある　慰霊碑でも見ながら
　待っててくれるかな　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1971.ko:
<voice 06163_00001971><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 나도 볼일만 마치고 바로 갈게.
　위령의 해변에 있는 위령비라도 구경하면서
　기다려 줄래, <pc>?<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1971.zh-Hans:
<voice 06163_00001971><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>等我忙完后就去找你。
你一边欣赏慰灵海滨的慰灵碑
一边等我好了，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1971.zh-Hant:
<voice 06163_00001971><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>等我忙完後就去找你。
你一邊欣賞慰靈海灘的慰靈碑
一邊等我好了，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1975.en:
<voice 00332_00001975><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Huff huff...
Sorry for the delay.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1975.ja:
<voice 00332_00001975><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「はあはあ……。
　<pc>　遅れてゴメンね。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1975.ko:
<voice 00332_00001975><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 헉, 헉…….
　<pc>, 늦어서 미안.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1975.zh-Hans:
<voice 00332_00001975><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>呼……呼……
<pc>，对不起，我迟到了。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1975.zh-Hant:
<voice 00332_00001975><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>呼呼……
<pc>，抱歉，我來晚了。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1976.en:
<voice 00368_00001976><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Well, let's find that shell right away.
We have to find the prettiest one!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1976.ja:
<voice 00368_00001976><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「それじゃ　さっそく　貝がらを探そう。
　ものすっごい　キレイなのを見つけるんだ！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1976.ko:
<voice 00368_00001976><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 그럼 바로 조개껍데기를 찾아 보자.
　끝내주게 예쁜 조개껍데기를 찾겠어!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1976.zh-Hans:
<voice 00368_00001976><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>我们赶快开始寻找贝壳吧。
一定要把最漂亮的贝壳找出来！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1976.zh-Hant:
<voice 00368_00001976><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>那就立刻來尋找貝殼吧。
一定要找出最漂亮的貝殼！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1977.en: <voice 00405_00001977><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Oh...? What's this?<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1977.ja: <voice 00405_00001977><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「あれ……？　なんだろう　この感じ。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1977.ko: <voice 00405_00001977><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 응……? 이 느낌은 뭐지?<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1977.zh-Hans: <voice 00405_00001977><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>咦，怎么有种奇怪的感觉？<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1977.zh-Hant: <voice 00405_00001977><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>咦……？怎麼有種奇怪的感覺？<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1978.en:
<voice 00525_00001978><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>This shell is an offering, right? 
How beautiful... 
It's like I'm being sucked in.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1978.ja:
<voice 00525_00001978><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「これって　お供えものの　貝がらだよね。
　なんて　キレイなんだろう……。
　まるで　吸い込まれるみたいだ。　<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1978.ko:
<voice 00525_00001978><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 이건 위령비에 바친 조개껍데기구나.
　정말 예쁘다…….
　빨려 들어갈 것만 같아.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1978.zh-Hans:
<voice 00525_00001978><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>这个贝壳是供品吧。
还真是漂亮啊……
仿佛灵魂都要被它吸走了。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1978.zh-Hant:
<voice 00525_00001978><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>這個貝殼是供品吧。
還真是漂亮啊……
彷彿靈魂都要被它吸走了。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1979.en:
<voice 00570_00001979><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Can't you hear it, <pc>?
It's like this shell is asking me
to take it away...<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1979.ja:
<voice 00570_00001979><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「<pc>には　聞こえない？
　この貝がらが　ボクに　持っていってくれって
　言ってるみたいなんだよ……。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1979.ko:
<voice 00570_00001979><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: {pc}|hpp(은,는) 안 들려?
　이 조개껍데기가 나한테 자길
　가져가 달라고 하는데…….<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1979.zh-Hans:
<voice 00570_00001979><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001><pc>听不到吗？
把我带走，把我带走……
似乎贝壳在这么请求我呢。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1979.zh-Hant:
<voice 00570_00001979><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001><pc>聽不到嗎？
這個貝殼似乎在對我說著
「把我帶走」……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1980.en:
<voice 00669_00001980><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>...It's saying that it doesn't want
to stay in a place like this. So
I have to bring it along...<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1980.ja:
<voice 00669_00001980><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「……こんなとこに　置かれたままは
　いやだって　言ってるんだ。
　だから　ボクが　持っていかなきゃ……。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1980.ko:
<voice 00669_00001980><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: ……이런 곳에 덩그러니
　남겨지고 싶지 않대.
　그러니 내가 가져가는 수밖에…….<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1980.zh-Hans:
<voice 00669_00001980><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>……它说不想被丢在这个地方了。
所以我得把它带走才行……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1980.zh-Hant:
<voice 00669_00001980><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>……它說
不想被丟在這個地方了。
所以我得把它帶走才行……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001534.ja: アーシクは　キレイな貝がらを　手に入れた！<me 60>
19001534.zh-Hans: 阿西克获得了漂亮的贝壳！<me 60>
19001534.zh-Hant: 阿西克獲得了漂亮的貝殼！<me 60>

1982.en:
<voice 00855_00001982><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>I'll give this to Keel as a gift. I'm
sure she'll take good care of it.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1982.ja:
<voice 00855_00001982><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「そうだ。これを　キールへの贈り物にしよう。
　きっと　大事にしてくれるよ。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1982.ko:
<voice 00855_00001982><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 그렇지, 이걸 키르에게 선물해야겠어.
　틀림없이 소중히 간직해 줄 거야.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1982.zh-Hans:
<voice 00855_00001982><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>对了，就把它当礼物吧。
琪尔肯定会喜欢的！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1982.zh-Hant:
<voice 00855_00001982><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>對了，把這個送給琪兒吧。
她肯定會好好珍惜的。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1984.en: <voice 00888_00001984><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Look! That's what the shell wants, too!!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1984.ja:
<voice 00888_00001984><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「ほら！　この貝がらも
　そうしてほしいって　言ってるよ！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1984.ko:
<voice 00888_00001984><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 들어 봐!
　이 조개껍데기도 그러고 싶대!!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1984.zh-Hans:
<voice 00888_00001984><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>听！
这贝壳也说希望我这样做呢！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1984.zh-Hant:
<voice 00888_00001984><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>聽！這貝殼也說
希望我這樣做呢！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1985.en:
<voice 00950_00001985><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>So you can't tell anyone in the
village that I took it from the
memorial, alright <pc>?<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1985.ja:
<voice 00950_00001985><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「だから　<pc>。
　この慰霊碑から　キレイな貝がらを取ったこと
　村のみんなには　ナイショにしてね。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1985.ko:
<voice 00950_00001985><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 그러니까, <pc>.
　이 위령비에서 조개껍데기를 주웠다는 건
　마을 사람들한테는 비밀이다?<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1985.zh-Hans:
<voice 00950_00001985><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>所以<pc>你千万要对村里的人保密啊。
别告诉大家这个漂亮的贝壳
是我从慰灵碑拿走的。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1985.zh-Hant:
<voice 00950_00001985><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>所以<pc>你千萬要對村裡的人保密啊。
別告訴大家這個漂亮的貝殼
是我從慰靈碑拿走的。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1986.ja: <voice 01283_00001986><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「うひゃあああああっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1986.zh-Hans: <voice 01283_00001986><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>哇哇哇哇哇！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1986.zh-Hant: <voice 01283_00001986><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>唔呀啊啊啊啊啊！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1987.ja: <voice 01350_00001987><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「おぬしら……。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1987.zh-Hans: <voice 01350_00001987><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>我说你们……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1987.zh-Hant: <voice 01350_00001987><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>你們兩個……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1988.en:
<voice 01380_00001988><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Wh-wh-wh-what the heck?!
Balcha... you scared me half to death!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1988.ja:
<voice 01380_00001988><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「ななな　なんだ。バルチャじいさんか……。
　ビックリさせないでよ。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1988.ko:
<voice 01380_00001988><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 뭐뭐뭐, 뭐야. 벌처 영감님이구나…….
　깜짝 놀랐잖아.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1988.zh-Hans:
<voice 01380_00001988><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>什、什么呀，原来是巴尔查爷爷……
别吓我啊。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1988.zh-Hant:
<voice 01380_00001988><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>什什什、什麼啊，原來是巴爾查爺爺……
別嚇我啊。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1989.en:
<voice 01475_00001989><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>Just what do you think you're doing
here? I explicitly instructed you never
to approach this memorial, Aashik.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1989.ja:
<voice 01475_00001989><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「ここで　何をしていたのだ？
　この慰霊碑に　近づいてはならぬと
　言ってあったはずだぞ　アーシク。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1989.ko:
<voice 01475_00001989><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 여기서 뭘 하는 거냐?
　이 위령비에 가까이 가선 안 된다고
　말했을 텐데, 아시크?<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1989.zh-Hans:
<voice 01475_00001989><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>你们在这里做什么？
我应该说过吧，阿西克。
不可以靠近这慰灵碑。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1989.zh-Hant:
<voice 01475_00001989><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>在這裡做什麼？
我應該說過吧，阿西克。
不可以靠近這慰靈碑。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1990.en:
<voice 01520_00001990><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>I-I didn't do anything!
We didn't do anything!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1990.ja:
<voice 01520_00001990><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「なっ　なんにも　してないよ！
　ボクたち　なんにも　してないったらっ。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1990.ko:
<voice 01520_00001990><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 우, 우린 아무 짓도 안 했어!
　정말로 아무 짓도 안 했다니까.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1990.zh-Hans:
<voice 01520_00001990><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>我、我们什么都没做！
你看，什么都没有。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1990.zh-Hant:
<voice 01520_00001990><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>我、我們什麼都沒做！
真的什麼都沒做！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1991.en: <voice 01645_00001991><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>...Is that true? <pc>?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1992.en: <voice 01695_00001992><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>...Well, it's fine.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1992.ja: <voice 01695_00001992><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「……まあ　よい。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1993.en:
<voice 01725_00001993><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>I doubt that either of you is stupid
enough to cause mischief with this
memorial right before the big wedding.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1993.ja:
<voice 01725_00001993><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「めでたい結婚式の前に　まさか
　この慰霊碑に悪さをするほど　アーシクも
　<pc>も　バカではあるまい。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1993.ko:
<voice 01725_00001993><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 설마 경사스러운 결혼식을 앞두고
　이 위령비에 허튼짓을 할 만큼 아시크도
　<pc>도 어리석지는 않을 테니.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1993.zh-Hans:
<voice 01725_00001993><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>在大婚之际对慰灵碑做手脚，
我想阿西克也好，<pc>也好，
都不会傻到那个地步。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1993.zh-Hant:
<voice 01725_00001993><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>在大婚之際對慰靈碑做手腳，
我想阿西克跟<pc>
應該都沒傻到那個地步。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1994.en:
<voice 01775_00001994><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>...This memorial must never be
touched. That goes double for you,
Aashik. You're the bridegroom, after all...<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1994.ja:
<voice 01775_00001994><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「……その慰霊碑には　決して
　関わっては　ならんのだ。特に　アーシク。
　花婿となる　おぬしは……な。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1994.ko:
<voice 01775_00001994><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: ……절대 이 위령비와 엮여서는 안 된다.
　특히 아시크, 예비 신랑인 넌 더더욱…….<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1994.zh-Hans:
<voice 01775_00001994><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>绝对不许和那慰灵碑扯上任何关系……
特别是阿西克，
记住，你马上就要当新郎了。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1994.zh-Hant:
<voice 01775_00001994><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>……絕對不許和那慰靈碑扯上任何關係。
尤其是阿西克，
記住，你馬上就要當新郎了。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1996.en: <voice 01850_00001996><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Why not, Balcha?<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1996.ja: <voice 01850_00001996><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「どうして？　バルチャじいさん。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1996.ko: <voice 01850_00001996><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 왜? 벌처 영감님.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1996.zh-Hans: <voice 01850_00001996><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>这是为什么，巴尔查爷爷？<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1996.zh-Hant: <voice 01850_00001996><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>這是為什麼，巴爾查爺爺？<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1997.en: <voice 01980_00001997><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>This memorial... Was raised after an awful tragedy.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1997.ja:
<voice 01980_00001997><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「この慰霊碑はな……。
　とても悲しい出来事に　まつわるものなのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1997.ko:
<voice 01980_00001997><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 이 위령비가 세워진 데에는…….
　아주 슬픈 사연이 있기 때문이지.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1997.zh-Hans:
<voice 01980_00001997><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>要说那座慰灵碑……
有过一段悲凉的往事。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1997.zh-Hant:
<voice 01980_00001997><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>這座慰靈碑啊……
有過一段悲涼的往事。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1998.en:
<voice 02105_00001998><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>Long ago, a young man from Leen fell
for a woman from the same village,
and the two made plans to be wed...<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1998.ja:
<voice 02105_00001998><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「昔　レーンの村の　ウェディの若者が
　同じ村に暮らす　ウェディの娘と恋に落ち
　結婚することになった……。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1998.ko:
<voice 02105_00001998><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 먼 옛날, 렌 마을의 웨디 청년이
　같은 마을에 사는 웨디 아가씨와 사랑에 빠져
　결혼을 하게 되었다…….<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1998.zh-Hans:
<voice 02105_00001998><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>过去，一个雷恩村的维迪青年
爱上了同村的维迪少女，
经历种种试炼后两个人终于要结婚了。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1998.zh-Hant:
<voice 02105_00001998><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>過去，一個雷恩村的維迪青年
愛上了同村的維迪少女，
最後終於要結婚了……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1999.en:
<voice 02315_00001999><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>The groom found a beautiful
shell and gave it to his bride.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1999.ja: <voice 02315_00001999><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「花婿は　美しい貝がらを見つけ　花嫁に贈る。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1999.ko:
<voice 02315_00001999><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 신랑은 아름다운 조개껍데기를 찾아
　신부에게 선물했지.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1999.zh-Hans: <voice 02315_00001999><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>作为信物，新郎送给新娘一枚美丽的贝壳。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1999.zh-Hant: <voice 02315_00001999><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>作為信物，新郎送給新娘一塊美麗的貝殼。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2000.en:
<voice 02365_00002000><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>The bride walked into the sea on this
beach to pray before the wedding. 
The purification prayer...<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2000.ja:
<voice 02365_00002000><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「花嫁は　結婚式を前に　身を清めるため
　この浜から　海へと入っていった。
　清めの祈りは　すぐに終わるはずだった……。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2000.ko:
<voice 02365_00002000><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 신부는 결혼식에 앞서 몸을 정결히 하고자
　이 해변을 통해 바다로 들어갔다.
　정화의 기도는 금방 끝날 예정이었지…….<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2000.zh-Hans:
<voice 02365_00002000><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>婚礼的前夕，新娘为了洁净身体，
从这个海滨慢慢地走入了大海。
净化的祈愿仪式本应很快就结束的……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2000.zh-Hant:
<voice 02365_00002000><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>婚禮前夕，新娘為了潔淨身體，
從這個海灘走入了大海。
淨化的祈願儀式本應該很快就結束的……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2002.en:
<voice 03160_00002002><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>The bride vanished into the
sea and never returned...<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2002.ja:
<voice 03160_00002002><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「花嫁は　海の中に消え
　帰ってはこなかったのだ……。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2002.ko:
<voice 03160_00002002><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 신부는 바닷속으로 사라지더니
　영영 돌아오지 않았다…….<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2002.zh-Hans:
<voice 03160_00002002><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>新娘的身影消失在了大海中，
从此再也没有回来……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2002.zh-Hant:
<voice 03160_00002002><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>新娘的身影消失在大海裡，
從此再也沒有回來……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2003.en: <voice 03340_00002003><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>And the grieving young man, he also...<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2003.ja:
<voice 03340_00002003><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「そして　悲しみにくれた若者も
　また……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2003.ko: <voice 03340_00002003><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 그리고 실의에 빠진 청년 역시……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2003.zh-Hans: <voice 03340_00002003><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>而悲痛的青年最终也决定……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2003.zh-Hant:
<voice 03340_00002003><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>而悲痛的青年
最終也決定……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2004.en: <voice 03460_00002004><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>It's said that he drowned himself on this very shore...<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2004.ja: <voice 03460_00002004><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「自ら　この海へ　その身を沈めたという……。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2004.ko: <voice 03460_00002004><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 제 발로 바닷속으로 몸을 던졌다고 하지…….<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2004.zh-Hans: <voice 03460_00002004><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>追随着恋人葬身海底……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2004.zh-Hant: <voice 03460_00002004><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>追隨著戀人葬身海底……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2005.en:
<voice 03640_00002005><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>Soon a series of disasters struck
the village. The villagers feared it was
the soul of the young man.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2005.ja:
<voice 03640_00002005><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「それから　いくつもの災いが村を襲った。
　人々は　無念のうちに死んだ　若者の魂が
　悪さをしていると　おそれたのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2005.ko:
<voice 03640_00002005><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 그 뒤로 수많은 재앙이 마을을 덮쳤다.
　사람들은 원통하게 죽은 젊은이들의 영혼이
　화를 부르는 것이라며 두려워했다.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2005.zh-Hans:
<voice 03640_00002005><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>后来，村子里发生过若干场灾难。
大家都认为是含恨而亡的青年的灵魂
带来的诅咒。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2005.zh-Hant:
<voice 03640_00002005><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>後來，村子經歷了好幾次的災難。
大家都認為這是含恨而亡的青年靈魂作祟
而感到害怕。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26952.en:
<voice 03670_00026952><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>That's why this memorial was built.
To appease the soul of that youngster...<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26952.ja:
<voice 03670_00026952><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「ゆえに　この慰霊碑が建てられた。
　その若者の魂を　鎮めるためにな……。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26952.ko:
<voice 03670_00026952><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 그래서 이 위령비가 세워진 것이다.
　그 젊은이들의 넋을 달래고자…….<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26952.zh-Hans:
<voice 03670_00026952><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>因此才建了这块慰灵碑，
希望镇住那位青年的灵魂……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26952.zh-Hant:
<voice 03670_00026952><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>因此才建了這塊慰靈碑，
來追悼那位青年的靈魂……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2006.en: <voice 03710_00002006><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>*Sob*... I feel so sorry for them...<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2006.ja: <voice 03710_00002006><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「ううっ　かわいそうだよぅ……。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2006.ko: <voice 03710_00002006><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 으흑, 너무 안됐어…….<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2006.zh-Hans: <voice 03710_00002006><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>呜呜，太可怜了……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2006.zh-Hant: <voice 03710_00002006><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>嗚嗚，太可憐了……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2007.en:
<voice 03770_00002007><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>Do you understand now, Aashik? 
You're to stay away from this memorial.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2007.ja:
<voice 03770_00002007><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「わかったな　アーシク？
　おぬしは　この慰霊碑に　関わってはならん。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2007.ko:
<voice 03770_00002007><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 알았느냐, 아시크?
　넌 이 위령비를 가까이해서는 안 된다.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2007.zh-Hans:
<voice 03770_00002007><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>明白了吧，阿西克。
所以你千万别跟这慰灵碑扯上关系。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2007.zh-Hant:
<voice 03770_00002007><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>明白了吧，阿西克。
所以你千萬別跟這慰靈碑扯上關係。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2008.en:
<voice 03820_00002008><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>But, Balcha... If Keel and I become
happy together, won't that bring
their spirits some joy too?<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2008.ja:
<voice 03820_00002008><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「でもさ　じいさん。それなら　代わりに
　ボクたちが　幸せになってあげれば
　ふたりも　よろこんでくれるんじゃないかな？<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2008.ko:
<voice 03820_00002008><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 하지만 영감님.
　그럼 우리가 대신 행복해지면
　그 두 사람도 기뻐하지 않을까?<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2008.zh-Hans:
<voice 03820_00002008><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>但是爷爷，如果我们今后能够
代替他们过上幸福的日子，
他们两个人的灵魂也会欣慰的吧？<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2008.zh-Hant:
<voice 03820_00002008><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>但是爺爺，如果我們今後能夠
代替他們過上幸福的日子，
他們兩個人的靈魂也會感到欣慰吧？<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2009.en:
<voice 03910_00002009><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>...Who knows what the dead think?
None can tell.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2009.ja:
<voice 03910_00002009><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「……死した者が　どう思うか。
　それは　誰にも　わからぬことだ。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2009.ko:
<voice 03910_00002009><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: ……망자가 어떻게 생각할지는
　아무도 모르는 법이다.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2009.zh-Hans:
<voice 03910_00002009><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>……逝去的人会怎么想，
谁也不可能猜到。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2009.zh-Hant:
<voice 03910_00002009><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>……逝去的人會怎麼想，
誰也不可能猜到。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2011.en:
<voice 04025_00002011><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Thanks for coming, <pc>.
I'm heading back to the village.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2011.ja:
<voice 04025_00002011><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「来てくれて　ありがとう　<pc>。
　それじゃ　ボクは　先に村に戻るね。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2011.ko:
<voice 04025_00002011><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 같이 와 줘서 고마워, <pc>.
　그럼 난 먼저 마을로 돌아갈게.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2011.zh-Hans:
<voice 04025_00002011><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>谢谢你陪了我这么久，<pc>。
我得先回村子里去了。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2011.zh-Hant:
<voice 04025_00002011><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>謝謝你來，<pc>。
那我先回村子了。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2012.en:
<voice 04190_00002012><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>...Oh no, I forgot. The village chief
was calling for you and Hyuza.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2012.ja:
<voice 04190_00002012><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「……いかん　忘れておった。
　村長が　おぬしと　ヒューザを呼んでいたのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2012.ko:
<voice 04190_00002012><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: ……이런, 깜빡했군.
　촌장이 너와 휴자를 찾더구나.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2012.zh-Hans:
<voice 04190_00002012><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>……对了，差点忘记了。
村长正在找你和修萨呢。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2012.zh-Hant:
<voice 04190_00002012><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>……對了，差點忘記。
村長正在找你和修扎呢。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2013.en:
<voice 04245_00002013><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>It seems like he's finally going
to choose the Shellner. You must
return to the village quickly, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2013.ja:
<voice 04245_00002013><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「いよいよ　シェルナー選びを行うようだ。
　すぐに　村へ帰るのだぞ　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2013.ko:
<voice 04245_00002013><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 드디어 셸너를 결정할 모양이다.
　어서 마을로 가 보거라, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2013.zh-Hans:
<voice 04245_00002013><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>就要进行舍纳的选拔了，
赶快回村子里去吧，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2013.zh-Hant:
<voice 04245_00002013><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>就要進行傳貝護者的選拔了，
趕快回村子裡去吧，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26953.en:
<voice 04300_00026953><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>Once you become a Shellner and
are recognized as an adult, you can
leave this village to find your parents.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26953.ja:
<voice 04300_00026953><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「シェルナーとして活躍し　一人前と認められれば
　おぬしは　この村を離れて
　両親を探す旅に　出ることができよう。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26953.ko:
<voice 04300_00026953><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 셸너로 활약해 능력을 인정받으면
　이 마을을 떠나
　네 부모를 찾아 여행할 수 있을 거다.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26953.zh-Hans:
<voice 04300_00026953><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>只要你当舍纳得到肯定，
就能离开村子
踏上寻找亲生父母的旅程了。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26953.zh-Hant:
<voice 04300_00026953><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>只要你當傳貝護者得到肯定，
你就能離開村子
踏上尋找親生父母的旅程了。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2014.en:
<voice 00030_00002014><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Hyuza still isn't here? That boy is so 
restless, always wandering about!<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2014.ja:
<voice 00030_00002014><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「ヒューザは　まだか？
　まったく　あいつは　いつもフラフラと
　ほっつき歩いておって　落ち着かんヤツだ！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2014.ko:
<voice 00030_00002014><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 휴자는 아직 안 온 거냐?
　나 원, 항상 어딜 그렇게
　싸돌아다니는 건지. 정신 사나운 녀석!<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2014.zh-Hans:
<voice 00030_00002014><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>修萨还没到？
真是的，那家伙总是一副吊儿郎当的样子，
从没让人少操心！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2014.zh-Hant:
<voice 00030_00002014><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>修扎還沒到？
真是的，那傢伙總是一副吊兒郎當的樣子，
從沒讓人少操心！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2015.en: <voice 00322_00002015><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Alright. You're both here now.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2015.ja: <voice 00322_00002015><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「よし。ふたりとも　そろったな。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2015.ko: <voice 00322_00002015><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 좋아, 둘 다 모였군.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2015.zh-Hans: <voice 00322_00002015><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>好，两个人都到了。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2015.zh-Hant: <voice 00322_00002015><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>好，兩個人都到了。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2016.en:
<voice 00377_00002016><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>We recently received a messenger from
the town of Julet. The bride,
Keel, is on her way to the Prayer Inn.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2016.ja:
<voice 00377_00002016><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「先ほど　ジュレットの町から　使いが来てな。
　花嫁のキールが　祈りの宿へ向かったそうだ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2016.ko:
<voice 00377_00002016><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 조금 전에 주레트 마을에서 사람이 왔다.
　신부인 키르가 기도의 여관으로 향했다더구나.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2016.zh-Hans:
<voice 00377_00002016><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>刚才有使者从玖莱特镇过来，
说新娘琪尔前往祈愿之所了。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2016.zh-Hant:
<voice 00377_00002016><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>剛才有使者從玖萊特鎮過來，
說新娘琪兒前往祈願旅店了。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2017.en:
<voice 00407_00002017><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>We have to find a new Shellner.
You two need to take the test now.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2017.ja:
<voice 00407_00002017><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「急いで　シェルナーを決めなければならん。
　さっそくだが　ふたりには
　わしの出す試験を　受けてもらうぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2017.ko:
<voice 00407_00002017><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 우리도 어서 셸너를 정해야 한다.
　그러니 너희 두 사람은
　내가 내는 시험을 치러 줘야겠다.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2017.zh-Hans:
<voice 00407_00002017><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>我们得尽快决定舍纳。
话不多说，你们俩就
做好准备，接受我的试炼吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2017.zh-Hant:
<voice 00407_00002017><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>我們得盡快決定傳貝護者。
話不多說，你們倆就接受我的考驗吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2018.en:
<voice 00512_00002018><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Spare me the dramatic speech, chief.
... What do you want us to do?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2018.ja:
<voice 00512_00002018><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「能書きはいらないぜ　村長。
　……で　何をすればいい？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2018.ko:
<voice 00512_00002018><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 잡다한 설명은 필요 없어, 촌장님.
　……그래서 뭘 하면 되는데?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2018.zh-Hans:
<voice 00512_00002018><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>不用说明了，村长。
说吧，要做什么？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2018.zh-Hant:
<voice 00512_00002018><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>不用說明了，村長。
說吧，要做什麼？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2019.en:
<voice 00562_00002019><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Fine. You know the cave just outside
the village, in the Colt Region?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2019.ja:
<voice 00562_00002019><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「うむ。このレーンの村を出て
　コルット地方を　北に向かった所に
　洞くつが　ひとつあるのは　知っているな？<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2019.ko:
<voice 00562_00002019><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 흠, 렌 마을을 나가
　코룻트 지방 북쪽으로 올라가면
　동굴이 하나 있다는 건 알 테지?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2019.zh-Hans:
<voice 00562_00002019><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>嗯，出了雷恩村
在克鲁特地区往北走有个洞窟，
你们知道吧？<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2019.zh-Hant:
<voice 00562_00002019><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>嗯，出了雷恩村
在克魯特地方往北走有個洞窟，
你們知道吧？<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2020.en:
<voice 00617_00002020><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Oh, that place? I've heard there's an
underground lake at the back of it.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2020.ja:
<voice 00617_00002020><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ああ　あそこか。奥には地底湖が
　広がってるって　聞いたことがあるぜ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2020.ko:
<voice 00617_00002020><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 아, 거기 말이군.
　안쪽에 지저 호수가 있다고 들었어.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2020.zh-Hans:
<voice 00617_00002020><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>嗯，那里啊，我听说
里面有个很大的地下湖。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2020.zh-Hant:
<voice 00617_00002020><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>嗯，那裡啊，我聽說
裡面有個很大的地底湖。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2021.en:
<voice 00667_00002021><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Yes, the Lake Cave. The goal of the
Shellner test is to bring back the water
from the lake at the bottom of the cave.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2021.ja:
<voice 00667_00002021><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「そう　その地底湖だ。洞くつの奥にある
　地底湖の水を　持ちかえってくることが
　シェルナー試験の内容だ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2021.ko:
<voice 00667_00002021><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 그래, 바로 그 지저 호수다.
　동굴 안쪽에 있는 지저 호수에서
　물을 떠오는 것이 셸너 시험의 과제다.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2021.zh-Hans:
<voice 00667_00002021><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>对，就是那个地下湖。
舍纳试炼的内容就是将洞窟深处
地下湖的水取回来。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2021.zh-Hant:
<voice 00667_00002021><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>對，就是那個地底湖。傳貝護者考驗的內容
就是將洞窟深處
地底湖的水取回來。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2022.en:
<voice 00797_00002022><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>The first to fill their bottle with
water from the underground lake and
bring it back will be the Shellner.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2022.ja:
<voice 00797_00002022><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「このビンに　地底湖の水を汲み
　先に持ちかえったほうを　シェルナーとする！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2022.ko:
<voice 00797_00002022><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 이 병에 지저 호수의 물을 담아
　먼저 도착하는 사람을 셸너로 삼겠다!<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2022.zh-Hans:
<voice 00797_00002022><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>用这个瓶子盛满地下湖的水
先回到这里的人，就是舍纳！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2022.zh-Hant:
<voice 00797_00002022><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>用這個瓶子盛滿地底湖的水
先回到這裡的人，就是傳貝護者！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2023.en: <voice 00827_00002023><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Now, take this.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2023.ja: <voice 00827_00002023><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「さあ　このビンを受け取るのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2023.ko: <voice 00827_00002023><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 자, 병을 받거라.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2023.zh-Hans: <voice 00827_00002023><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>好了，拿着这个瓶子吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2023.zh-Hant: <voice 00827_00002023><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>好了，拿著這個瓶子吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2024.en:
<voice 00889_00002024><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>...Seriously? A water fetching test?
And the first to finish wins?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2024.ja:
<voice 00889_00002024><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「……はあ？　水汲みが試験だって？
　しかも　早い者勝ちなのかよ……。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2024.ko:
<voice 00889_00002024><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: ……뭐? 물 떠오기가 시험 과제라고?
　게다가 선착순이라니…….<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2024.zh-Hans:
<voice 00889_00002024><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……什么啊，取水就是试炼？
而且还是比速度吗……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2024.zh-Hant:
<voice 00889_00002024><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……什麼啊，取水就是考驗？
而且還是比速度嗎……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2025.en:
<voice 00957_00002025><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>...It has to be the water from the under
ground lake. If you leave it in the bottle, its
beautiful color will disappear over time.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2025.ja:
<voice 00957_00002025><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「……地底湖の水はな。
　ビンに入れたまま　ほうっておくと
　その美しい色合いが　消えてしまうのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2025.ko:
<voice 00957_00002025><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: ……지저 호수의 물은
　병에 담은 채로 내버려두면
　그 아름다운 빛깔이 사라진다.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2025.zh-Hans:
<voice 00957_00002025><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>……那地下湖的水啊，
如果就那样放在瓶子里，
可是会失去它美丽的色泽的。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2025.zh-Hant:
<voice 00957_00002025><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>……那地底湖的水啊，
如果就那樣放在瓶子裡，
可是會失去它美麗的色澤的。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2027.en:
<voice 00987_00002027><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>So once you get the water, bring it
back before the sun and moon have
gone round! That is very important!!<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2027.ja:
<voice 00987_00002027><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「だから　水を汲んだら　太陽と月が
　ひと巡りする前に　わしの所へ持ってこい！
　わかったな　ふたりとも！！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2027.ko:
<voice 00987_00002027><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 따라서 물을 담거든 해와 달이
　한 바퀴 돌기 전에 내게 가지고 오거라!
　두 사람 다 이해했겠지!?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2027.zh-Hans:
<voice 00987_00002027><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>所以，必须在太阳与月亮
完成一轮交替之前，将取得的水拿到我面前来！
听懂了吧，你们两个！！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2027.zh-Hant:
<voice 00987_00002027><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>所以，必須在太陽與月亮
完成一輪交替之前，將取得的水拿到我面前來！
聽懂了吧，你們兩個！！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2028.en:
<voice 01056_00002028><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Seems I don't have a choice. Let's do it!
I'll bring it back before <pc> does.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2028.ja:
<voice 01056_00002028><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「しかたねえな。やってやるよ。
　<pc>よりも早く
　このオレが　持ってきてやるぜ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2028.ko:
<voice 01056_00002028><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 하는 수 없지. 어디 해 보자고.
　<pc>보다 내가 먼저
　물을 떠 오겠어.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2028.zh-Hans:
<voice 01056_00002028><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>没办法，那就比吧。
我一定会比<pc>早一步
把水取回来的。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2028.zh-Hant:
<voice 01056_00002028><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>沒辦法，那就比吧。
我一定會比<pc>早一步
把水取回來的。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2029.en:
<voice 01197_00002029><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Here, <pc>.
You take a bottle, too.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2029.ja:
<voice 01197_00002029><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「ほれ。<pc>も
　このビンを　受け取るのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2029.ko:
<voice 01197_00002029><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 자, <pc> 너도
　병을 받거라.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2029.zh-Hans:
<voice 01197_00002029><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>来，<pc>你也
收下这个瓶子。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2029.zh-Hant:
<voice 01197_00002029><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>來，<pc>你也
收下這個瓶子。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001535.en:
<pc> received a Small Glass Bottle (Key Item)
from Chief Setorii!<me 60>
19001535.ja:
<pc>は　セトリー村長から
ガラスの小ビン（だいじなもの）を　受け取った！<me 60>
19001535.ko:
{pc}|hpp(은,는) 세트리 촌장에게서
작은 유리병(중요한 물건)을 받았다!<me 60>
19001535.zh-Hans:
<pc>从赛特力村长手中
收下了玻璃小瓶（重要物品）！<me 60>
19001535.zh-Hant:
<pc>從賽特力村長手中
收下了玻璃小瓶（重要物品）！<me 60>

2031.en: <voice 01347_00002031><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Alright. Do you both have your bottles?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2031.ja: <voice 01347_00002031><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「よーし。ふたりとも　ビンを持ったな？<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2031.ko: <voice 01347_00002031><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 좋아, 두 사람 다 병은 잘 챙겼겠지?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2031.zh-Hans: <voice 01347_00002031><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>好，两个人都拿到瓶子了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2031.zh-Hant: <voice 01347_00002031><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>好，兩個人都拿到瓶子了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2032.en: <voice 01377_00002032><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Ahem. Then, let the Shellner test...<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2032.ja:
<voice 01377_00002032><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「コホン。では　ただいまより
　シェルナー選定試験……<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2032.ko:
<voice 01377_00002032><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 흠흠, 그럼 지금부터
　셸너 선정 시험을……<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2032.zh-Hans:
<voice 01377_00002032><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>咳咳。那么，决定舍纳的试炼
现在……<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2032.zh-Hant:
<voice 01377_00002032><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>咳咳。那麼，決定傳貝護者的考驗
現在……<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2033.ja: <voice 01460_00002033><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「開始ぃっ！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2034.en: <voice 01683_00002034><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>I won't take it easy on you, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2034.ja: <voice 01683_00002034><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「<pc>。手は抜かねえぜ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2034.ko: <voice 01683_00002034><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 봐주지 않겠어.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2034.zh-Hans: <voice 01683_00002034><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pc>，我可不会放水哦。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2034.zh-Hant: <voice 01683_00002034><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pc>，我可不會放水喔。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2035.en:
<voice 01832_00002035><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001><pc>, you'd better get going.
The sooner you get started, the better!<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2035.ja:
<voice 01832_00002035><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「<pc>も　さっさと行くのだ。
　この試験は　早い者勝ちなのだぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2035.ko:
<voice 01832_00002035><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 너도 어서 출발해라.
　이 시험은 먼저 온 사람이 이기는 거니까!<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2035.zh-Hans:
<voice 01832_00002035><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001><pc>，你也快出发吧，
这场试炼可是比速度的！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2035.zh-Hant:
<voice 01832_00002035><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001><pc>，你也快出發吧，
這場考驗可是比速度的！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3379.en:
<voice 00211_00003379><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>H... hey, <pc>. Thanks for everything
you did at Solace Beach.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3379.ja:
<voice 00211_00003379><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「や……やあ　<pc>。
　慰霊の浜では　いろいろと　ありがとう。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3379.ko:
<voice 00211_00003379><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 아…… 안녕, <pc>.
　위령의 해변에서는 도와줘서 고마워.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3379.zh-Hans:
<voice 00211_00003379><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>哦……嗨，<pc>。
慰灵海滨那时，谢谢你啊。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3379.zh-Hant:
<voice 00211_00003379><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>喔……嗨，<pc>。
慰靈海灘那時，謝謝你啊。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3380.en:
<voice 00241_00003380><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>I've thought about what old man Balcha
said, but I think I'm still going
to use this shell as the gift.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3380.ja:
<voice 00241_00003380><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「バルチャじいさんの話を聞いて
　考えたんだけど　やっぱり　あの貝がらは
　ボクの贈り物に　させてもらうよ。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3380.ko:
<voice 00241_00003380><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 벌처 영감님 얘기를 듣고
　생각해 봤는데, 역시 그 조개껍데기는
　내 예물로 써야겠어.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3380.zh-Hans:
<voice 00241_00003380><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>我听了巴尔查爷爷的话，
思考了一下，那个贝壳
就当作是我的礼物吧。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3380.zh-Hant:
<voice 00241_00003380><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>我聽了巴爾查爺爺的話，
思考了一下，那個貝殼
就當作是我的禮物吧。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3381.en:
<voice 00271_00003381><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>I'll bet the shell asked me to take
it along because it wanted to
share in our happiness!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3381.ja:
<voice 00271_00003381><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「貝がらが　ボクに持ってってくれって
　言ってたのは　ボクたちの幸せを
　分けてほしいってことだと思うんだ！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3381.ko:
<voice 00271_00003381><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 조개껍데기가 나에게 자길
　가져가 달라고 한 건 우리의 행복을
　나눠 달란 뜻이었을 거야!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3381.zh-Hans:
<voice 00271_00003381><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>贝壳之所以会叫我把它拿走，
我觉得是因为它希望分享到
我们的幸福！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3381.zh-Hant:
<voice 00271_00003381><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>貝殼之所以會叫我把它拿走，
我覺得是因為它希望分享到
我們的幸福！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3382.en:
<voice 00329_00003382><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Of course.
The Shellner test's about to begin.
I'm rooting for both of you!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3382.ja:
<voice 00329_00003382><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「そうそう。シェルナーの試験が始まるんだね。
　ボクは　<pc>と　ヒューザの
　どっちも　おうえんしているよ！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3382.ko:
<voice 00329_00003382><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 맞다, 곧 셸너 시험이 시작된다면서?
　난 {pc}|hpp(과,와) 휴자
　둘 다 응원할게!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3382.zh-Hans:
<voice 00329_00003382><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>对了对了，舍纳的试炼要开始了。
<pc>和修萨
我会为你们加油哦！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3382.zh-Hant:
<voice 00329_00003382><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>對了對了，傳貝護者的考驗要開始了。
<pc>和修扎
我都會為你們加油喔！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001536.en:
<pc> drew water from the underground
lake into the Glass Bottle.<me 60>
19001536.ja:
<pc>は　地底湖の水を
ガラスの小ビンに　汲んだ！<me 60>
19001536.ko:
{pc}|hpp(은,는) 지저 호수의 물을
작은 유리병에 담았다!<me 60>
19001536.zh-Hans:
<pc>把地下湖的水
装入玻璃小瓶了！<me 60>
19001536.zh-Hant:
<pc>將地底湖的水
裝入了玻璃小瓶！<me 60>

19001428.en:
<voice 00245_19001428><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Tch...
I can't believe I fell behind.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001428.ja:
<voice 00245_19001428><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ちっ……。
　<pc>に　後れをとるとはな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001428.ko:
<voice 00245_19001428><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 쳇…….
　<pc>에게 한발 뒤질 줄이야.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001428.zh-Hans:
<voice 00245_19001428><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>嘁……
比<pc>晚了一步啊。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001428.zh-Hant:
<voice 00245_19001428><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>呿……
居然會輸給<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8906.en: <voice 00385_00008906><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>So this is the underground lake...<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8906.ja: <voice 00385_00008906><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ここが　地底湖か……。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8906.ko: <voice 00385_00008906><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 여기가 지저 호수인가…….<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8906.zh-Hans: <voice 00385_00008906><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>这里就是地下湖吗……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8906.zh-Hant: <voice 00385_00008906><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>這裡就是地底湖啊……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7287.en:
<voice 00460_00007287><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>It's true that this doesn't
seem like just any old water.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7287.ja:
<voice 00460_00007287><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「確かに　ここの水は
　他の水とは　ちがうらしいな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7287.ko:
<voice 00460_00007287><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 확실히 이곳의 물은
　다른 물과는 다른 것 같군.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7287.zh-Hans: <voice 00460_00007287><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>这里的水的确不同于其他的地方。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7287.zh-Hant:
<voice 00460_00007287><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>這裡的水似乎真的
與其他的水不一樣啊。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7288.en: <voice 00585_00007288><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Alright, that'll do.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7288.ja: <voice 00585_00007288><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「これで　よし……と。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7288.ko: <voice 00585_00007288><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 이거면…… 되겠지.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7288.zh-Hans: <voice 00585_00007288><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>这样就行了……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7288.zh-Hant: <voice 00585_00007288><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>這樣就行了……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7289.en:
<voice 00655_00007289><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>All that remains is to get back to
the village. The sooner we get there,
the sooner this can be over with.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7289.ja:
<voice 00655_00007289><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「あとは　村に帰るだけか。
　で　早く着いたほうが
　シェルナーに　なれるってわけだ……。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7289.ko:
<voice 00655_00007289><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 이제 마을로 돌아가기만 하면 되는 건가.
　먼저 도착한 사람이
　셸너가 된다는 말이지…….<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7289.zh-Hans:
<voice 00655_00007289><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>接下来返回村子就行了。
按照规则，先到达的人将成为舍纳……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7289.zh-Hant:
<voice 00655_00007289><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>再來只要回村子就行了。
而最早抵達的人
就能成為傳貝護者……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7290.en:
<voice 00685_00007290><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Look, I know you're tryin' to
become the Shellner to find
your parents and all, but...<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7290.ja:
<voice 00685_00007290><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「お前が　両親を探すために
　シェルナーに　なろうとしてることは
　オレも　知ってるさ。だがな……。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7290.ko:
<voice 00685_00007290><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 네가 부모님을 찾기 위해
　셸너가 되려고 하는 건
　나도 알고 있다. 하지만…….<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7290.zh-Hans:
<voice 00685_00007290><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>你为了寻找父母，
非常渴望成为舍纳。
这点我心里很明白……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7290.zh-Hant:
<voice 00685_00007290><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>你為了尋找父母
而想成為傳貝護者的事情，
我也很清楚。不過……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7291.en: <voice 00815_00007291><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>...I'm the one who's gonna win, got it?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7291.ja: <voice 00815_00007291><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「……勝つのは　オレだぜ？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7291.ko: <voice 00815_00007291><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: ……이길 사람은 나거든?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7291.zh-Hans: <voice 00815_00007291><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>但最终胜利的人必然是我。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7291.zh-Hant: <voice 00815_00007291><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……勝利者將會是我喔！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7294.en:
<voice 00030_00007294><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>You fetched the water from the under
ground lake? Come, let me see.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7294.ja:
<voice 00030_00007294><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「地底湖の水は　汲んできたのだろう？
　見せてみろ　ほれほれ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7294.ko:
<voice 00030_00007294><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 지저 호수의 물은 떠 왔겠지?
　어디 보여 보거라, 어서.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7294.zh-Hans:
<voice 00030_00007294><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>地下湖的水，你取来了吧？
来，让我瞧瞧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7294.zh-Hant:
<voice 00030_00007294><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>地底湖的水，你取來了吧？
來，讓我瞧瞧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7295.en:
Would you like to show Chief
Setorii the Glass Bottle of water? <yesno><close>
7295.ja:
セトリー村長に　湖の水の入った
ガラスの小ビンを　見せますか？<yesno><close>
7295.ko:
세트리 촌장에게 호수의 물이 든
작은 유리병을 보여 주겠습니까?<yesno><close>
7295.zh-Hans:
要给赛特力村长看看
装了湖水的玻璃小瓶吗？<yesno><close>
7295.zh-Hant:
要給賽特力村長看看
裝了湖水的玻璃小瓶嗎？<yesno><close>

7296.en:
<voice 00120_00007296><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Huh? Are you saying that you
couldn't make it to the underground
lake? No, no, that can't be true.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7296.ja:
<voice 00120_00007296><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「むむっ。もしや　地底湖まで
　行けなかったというのか？
　いやいや　そんなことはあるまい。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7296.ko:
<voice 00120_00007296><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 음? 설마 지저 호수까지
　가지도 못한 것이냐?
　설마, 그럴 리가.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7296.zh-Hans:
<voice 00120_00007296><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>嗯嗯？难道你没能到达地下湖？
不可能啊，怎么会有那种事。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7296.zh-Hant:
<voice 00120_00007296><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>唔！莫非你沒成功去到
地底湖嗎？
不對啊，那怎麼可能。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7297.en:
<voice 00150_00007297><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>If you don't show me the water from
the underground lake, you can't
become the Shellner. Come now, show me.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7297.ja:
<voice 00150_00007297><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「わしに見せて　地底湖の水と認められなければ　
　シェルナーには　なれんのだぞ？
　もったいぶらんと　見せてみい。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7297.ko:
<voice 00150_00007297><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 내게 지저 호수의 물을 보이지 않으면
　셸너가 될 수 없다.
　뜸 들이지 말고 어서 보여 보거라.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7297.zh-Hans:
<voice 00150_00007297><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>不给我验证地下湖的水，
你就当不成舍纳了哟。
别藏着掖着了，快拿出来吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7297.zh-Hant:
<voice 00150_00007297><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>只要讓我確認過是地底湖的水，
你就能成為傳貝護者喔！
別裝模作樣了，快讓我看看。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7299.en:
<pc> returned the Glass Bottle
to Chief Setorii.
7299.ja:
<pc>は　セトリー村長に
ガラスの小ビンを　返した。
7299.zh-Hans:
<pc>把玻璃小瓶
还给了赛特力村长。
7299.zh-Hant:
<pc>把玻璃小瓶
還給賽特力村長。

7300.en:
<voice 00370_00007300><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Let's see...
Seems like you took a long time.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7300.ja:
<voice 00370_00007300><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「どれどれ……。
　だいぶ　時間が　かかったようだが。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7300.ko:
<voice 00370_00007300><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 어디 보자…….
　시간은 제법 걸린 모양인데.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7300.zh-Hans:
<voice 00370_00007300><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>让我看看……
还真花了不少时间呢。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7300.zh-Hant:
<voice 00370_00007300><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>讓我瞧瞧……
你花了不少時間啊。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7301.en:
<voice 00440_00007301><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Hmmm... this is no good!
Look at this water, it's all muddy.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7301.ja:
<voice 00440_00007301><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「むむむ　これはダメだ！
　見てみい　水が　にごっておるっ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7301.ko:
<voice 00440_00007301><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 으음, 이건 안 돼!
　봐라, 물이 탁해졌잖니.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7301.zh-Hans:
<voice 00440_00007301><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>哎呀，不行啊！
你看，这水都浑浊了。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7301.zh-Hant:
<voice 00440_00007301><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>唔，這樣不行！
你看，水變混濁了！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7302.en:
