<voice 00494_00007302><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>You'll need to start over. You have to
fetch the water and bring it back
before a full day passes. Understand?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7302.ja:
<voice 00494_00007302><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「もう一度　やり直しだ。いいか？
　水を汲んだら　太陽と月が　ひと巡りする前に
　わしの所へ　持ってくるんだぞ？<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7302.ko:
<voice 00494_00007302><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 처음부터 다시 시작이다. 알겠지?
　물을 담거든 해와 달이 한 바퀴 돌기 전에
　내게 가지고 오거라.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7302.zh-Hans:
<voice 00494_00007302><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>重来一次。
记住，必须在太阳与月亮完成一轮
交替前将取的水拿到我面前来啊。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7302.zh-Hant:
<voice 00494_00007302><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>再重來一次。聽好了，
必須在太陽與月亮完成一輪交替之前，
將取得的水拿到我面前來喔！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001537.en:
<pc> received the Small Glass Bottle (Key Item)
from Chief Setorii!<me 60>
19001537.ja:
<pc>は
ガラスの小ビン（だいじなもの）を　受け取った！<me 60>
19001537.zh-Hans:
<pc>收下了
玻璃小瓶（重要物品）！<me 60>
19001537.zh-Hant:
<pc>收下了
玻璃小瓶（重要物品）！<me 60>

7304.en:
<voice 00625_00007304><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Come on, <pc>. Hurry up and
get going. Otherwise Hyuza will
get back before you do!<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7304.ja:
<voice 00625_00007304><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「ほれほれ　<pc>。早く行くのだ。
　ヒューザが先に　戻ってきてしまうぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7304.ko:
<voice 00625_00007304><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 뭘 하고 있냐, <pc>. 어서 가지 않고.
　그러다 휴자가 먼저 돌아오겠구나!<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7304.zh-Hans:
<voice 00625_00007304><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>行了，<pc>，快点出发吧。
不然修萨就要抢先回来了！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7304.zh-Hant:
<voice 00625_00007304><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>好了好了，<pc>，快去吧。
不然修扎就要搶先回來了！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2042.en:
<voice 00966_00002042><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>You're just a little too late, Hyuza.
<pc> just got back with the  water.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2042.ja:
<voice 00966_00002042><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「ほんの少し　遅かったようだな　ヒューザ。
　ひと足早く　<pc>が
　地底湖の水を汲んで　戻ってきておるぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2042.ko:
<voice 00966_00002042><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 아쉽지만 조금 늦었구나, 휴자.
　{pc}|hpp(이,가) 한발 먼저
　지저 호수의 물을 떠 왔다.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2042.zh-Hans:
<voice 00966_00002042><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>你晚了一步呢，修萨。
<pc>已经早你一步
把地下湖的水取回来了。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2042.zh-Hant:
<voice 00966_00002042><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>你晚了一步呢，修扎。
<pc>已經早你一步
先取得地底湖的水回來了。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2043.en:
<voice 01085_00002043><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Come on, <pc>.
Show me the bottle.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2043.ja:
<voice 01085_00002043><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「さあ　<pc>。
　さっさと　ビンを　わしに見せろ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2043.ko:
<voice 01085_00002043><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 자, <pc>.
　어서 내게 병을 보여다오.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2043.zh-Hans:
<voice 01085_00002043><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>好了，<pc>，
快点把瓶子拿出来给我看吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2043.zh-Hant:
<voice 01085_00002043><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>好了，<pc>，
快點把瓶子拿出來給我看吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2044.en:
<pc> returned the Glass Bottle to Chief
Setorii.
2044.ja:
<pc>は　セトリー村長に
ガラスの小ビンを　返した。
2044.zh-Hans:
<pc>把玻璃小瓶
还给了赛特力村长。
2044.zh-Hant:
<pc>把玻璃小瓶
還給賽特力村長。

2045.en:
<voice 01300_00002045><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Hmm, let's see... There's no doubt
that this is indeed water from
the underground lake.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2045.ja:
<voice 01300_00002045><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「どれどれ　ふむ……。
　まちがいなく　これは地底湖の水だ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2045.ko:
<voice 01300_00002045><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 어디 보자, 흠…….
　이건 틀림없이 지저 호수의 물이군.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2045.zh-Hans:
<voice 01300_00002045><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>我看看。嗯……
这毫无疑问是地下湖的水。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2045.zh-Hant:
<voice 01300_00002045><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>我看看。嗯……
這毫無疑問是地底湖的水。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2046.en:
<voice 01530_00002046><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Excellent! The test is over. I hereby
declare that the one who will serve
as Aashik's Shellner is <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2046.ja:
<voice 01530_00002046><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「よろしい！　試験は終わりだ。
　アーシクのシェルナーを務める者は
　<pc>であると　今ここに　宣言する！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2046.ko:
<voice 01530_00002046><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 좋아! 시험은 끝이다.
　아시크의 셸너를 맡을 사람은
　<pc>임을 이 자리에서 선언한다!<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2046.zh-Hans:
<voice 01530_00002046><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>很好！试炼结束。
我在此宣布，阿西克的舍纳
就是<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2046.zh-Hant:
<voice 01530_00002046><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>很好！考驗結束。
我在此宣布，阿西克的傳貝護者
就是<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2047.en:
<voice 01700_00002047><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Now, as a sign that you've
become a Shellner, please take this
Zoomstone! Ask Teaty how to use it.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2047.ja:
<voice 01700_00002047><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「それでは　シェルナーになった証として
　お前に　ルーラストーンをさずけよう！
　使い方は　孤児院のティーティに聞くがいい。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2047.ko:
<voice 01700_00002047><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 그럼 셸너가 된 증표로
　네게 루라 스톤을 주마!
　사용법은 고아원의 티티에게 물어보거라.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2047.zh-Hans:
<voice 01700_00002047><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>那么，就给你鲁拉之石吧，
这是你成为舍纳的证明！
至于使用方法，你去问孤儿院的缇缇吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2047.zh-Hant:
<voice 01700_00002047><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>那麼，就給你魯拉石吧，
這是你成為傳貝護者的證明！
至於使用方法，你去問孤兒院的緹緹吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001538.en:
<pc> received the Zoomstone from Chief
Setorii!<me 60>
19001538.ja:
<pc>は　セトリー村長から
ルーラストーンを　受け取った！<me 60>
19001538.zh-Hans:
<pc>从赛特力村长手中
收下了鲁拉之石！<me 60>
19001538.zh-Hant:
<pc>從賽特力村長手中
收下了魯拉石！<me 60>

39120.en:
The Zoomstone lets you travel anywhere
you've recorded instantly. No matter
how much you use it, it won't run out.
39120.ja:
ルーラストーンは　記憶させた場所に
一瞬で移動できる　魔法の石です。
何度使っても　なくなりません。
39120.ko:
루라 스톤은 등록한 장소로
단숨에 이동할 수 있는 마법의 돌입니다.
여러 번 사용해도 없어지지 않습니다.
39120.zh-Hans:
鲁拉之石是魔法之石，
可以瞬间让你移动到它记录的地点。
反复使用也不会消失。
39120.zh-Hant:
魯拉石是魔法之石，
可以瞬間讓你移動到它記錄的地點。
反覆使用也不會消失。

19000937.en:
This Zoomstone doesn't have a
location in it yet. Its destination can
be set in the church.
19000937.ja:
このルーラストーンには
レーンの村が　記憶されています。
19000937.ko:
이 루라 스톤에는
렌 마을이 새겨져 있습니다.
19000937.zh-Hans:
这块鲁拉之石
记录着雷恩村。
19000937.zh-Hant:
這塊魯拉石
記錄著雷恩村。

19000938.en:
In addition to towns you visit, you can 
also record other locations by looking
for stone monuments around the world.
19000938.ja:
冒険で訪れた場所が　記憶されるほか　
各地にある　いざないの石碑を　しらべることで
そこを　行き先として　記憶させられます。
19000938.ko:
모험에서 방문한 장소가 새겨질 뿐 아니라
각지에 있는 이끌림의 비석을 조사하면
그곳을 목적지로 등록할 수 있습니다.
19000938.zh-Hans:
除了会记录在冒险中探访过的地点以外，
在调查各地的引路石碑后，
更可将其记录为目的地。
19000938.zh-Hant:
除了會記錄在冒險中探訪過的地點以外，
在調查各地的引路石碑後，
更可將其記錄為目的地。

2049.en:
<voice 01930_00002049><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>What a shame, Hyuza. You'll have
to wait for the next opportunity.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2049.ja:
<voice 01930_00002049><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「残念だったな　ヒューザ。
　お前は　次の機会を待つがいい。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2049.ko:
<voice 01930_00002049><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 아쉽게 됐구나, 휴자.
　넌 다음 기회를 기다리거라.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2049.zh-Hans:
<voice 01930_00002049><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>真可惜啊，修萨，
你就等待下一次机会吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2049.zh-Hant:
<voice 01930_00002049><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>真可惜啊，修扎，
你就等待下一次機會吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2050.en: <voice 02030_00002050><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Next time...? I can't wait that long.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2050.ja: <voice 02030_00002050><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「次……ね。そんなもん　待っちゃいられねえな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2050.ko:
<voice 02030_00002050><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 다음 기회라…….
　그딴 걸 기다릴 시간은 없어.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2050.zh-Hans: <voice 02030_00002050><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>还下次……谁等得到下次啊。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2050.zh-Hant: <voice 02030_00002050><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>還下次……咧。誰等得到下次啊。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2051.ja: <voice 02295_00002051><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「あっ　ヒューザ？<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2051.ko: <voice 02295_00002051><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 어, 휴자?<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2052.en:
<voice 02345_00002052><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Ah, Aashik. The Shellner has
been decided. <pc> has been 
chosen to take on the role.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2052.ja:
<voice 02345_00002052><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「おお　アーシク。
　ついに　シェルナーが決まったぞ。
　<pc>が　シェルナーとなったのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2052.ko:
<voice 02345_00002052><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 오오, 아시크.
　마침내 셸너가 결정됐다.
　{pc}|hpp(이,가) 셸너로 선정되었다.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2052.zh-Hans:
<voice 02345_00002052><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>哦，阿西克，
舍纳已经选出来了。
是<pc>当上了舍纳。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2052.zh-Hant:
<voice 02345_00002052><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>喔，阿西克，
傳貝護者已經選出來了。
是<pc>當上了傳貝護者。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2053.en:
<voice 02560_00002053><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Really? Congratulations, <pc>. So you're
the one who'll be my Shellner!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2053.ja:
<voice 02560_00002053><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「ほんとう！？　おめでとう　<pc>。
　そっかあ　やっぱり　キミがボクの
　シェルナーに　なってくれたんだね！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2053.ko:
<voice 02560_00002053><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 정말이야!? 축하해, <pc>.
　그래, 역시 네가
　내 셸너가 됐구나!!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2053.zh-Hans:
<voice 02560_00002053><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>真的吗？！恭喜你，<pc>。
这样啊，所以你还是
成为了我的舍纳嘛！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2053.zh-Hant:
<voice 02560_00002053><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>真的嗎！？恭喜你，<pc>。
這樣啊，所以你還是
成為了我的傳貝護者嘛！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2054.en:
<voice 02700_00002054><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>I'm sure Hyuza tried his best, too!
Thank you, Hyuza!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2054.ja:
<voice 02700_00002054><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「ヒューザも　がんばってくれたんだよね！
　ありがとう　ヒューザ！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2054.ko:
<voice 02700_00002054><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 휴자도 고생 많이 했지?
　고마워, 휴자!!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2054.zh-Hans:
<voice 02700_00002054><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>修萨也很努力了！
谢谢你，修萨！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2054.zh-Hant:
<voice 02700_00002054><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>修扎也很努力了！
謝謝你，修扎！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2055.en:
<voice 02844_00002055><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>You beat me and became the 
Shellner. Don't go screwing this up, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2055.ja:
<voice 02844_00002055><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「オレに勝って　シェルナーになったんだ。
　ヘマすんじゃねえぞ　<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2055.ko:
<voice 02844_00002055><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 날 이기고 셸너가 됐으니
　실수하지 마라, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2055.zh-Hans:
<voice 02844_00002055><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>你是赢了我，成为舍纳的，
可别出差错啰，<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2055.zh-Hant:
<voice 02844_00002055><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>你是贏了我，成為傳貝護者的，
可別出差錯囉，<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2056.en:
<voice 03094_00002056><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Aashik. I assume you've brought
the shell for the bride?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2056.ja:
<voice 03094_00002056><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「アーシクよ。花嫁に贈る貝がらは
　持ってきたのだろうな？<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2056.ko:
<voice 03094_00002056><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 아시크, 신부에게 선물할 조개껍데기는
　가지고 왔겠지?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2056.zh-Hans:
<voice 03094_00002056><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>阿西克，准备送给新娘的贝壳
你带过来了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2056.zh-Hant:
<voice 03094_00002056><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>阿西克，準備送給新娘的貝殼
你有帶過來吧？<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2057.en: <voice 03219_00002057><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Yeah. Here it is, chief.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2057.ja: <voice 03219_00002057><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「はい　これです　村長さん。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2057.ko: <voice 03219_00002057><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 네. 이겁니다, 촌장님.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2057.zh-Hans: <voice 03219_00002057><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>有，在这里，村长。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2057.zh-Hant: <voice 03219_00002057><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>有，在這裡，村長。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2058.en:
<voice 03428_00002058><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Oh-ho. This is quite a beautiful shell!
Where on earth did you find it?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2058.ja:
<voice 03428_00002058><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「ほほう。なかなか　キレイな貝がらではないか。
　いったい　どこで　見つけたのだ？<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2058.ko:
<voice 03428_00002058><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 오호, 아주 예쁜 조개껍데기로군.
　대체 어디서 찾은 거냐?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2058.zh-Hans:
<voice 03428_00002058><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>哇，真是漂亮的贝壳，
你究竟在哪里找到的？<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2058.zh-Hant:
<voice 03428_00002058><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>哇，真是漂亮的貝殼，
你究竟在哪裡找到的？<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2059.en: <voice 03503_00002059><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Uhh, on the beach outside the village...<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2059.ja: <voice 03503_00002059><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「えっと　村の外の砂浜で……。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2059.ko: <voice 03503_00002059><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 그게, 마을 밖 모래사장에서요…….<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2059.zh-Hans: <voice 03503_00002059><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>呃，是在村子外的沙滩……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2059.zh-Hant: <voice 03503_00002059><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>呃，是在村子外的沙灘……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2060.en:
<voice 03558_00002060><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>I see. You've done well.
I'm sure your bride will be pleased.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2060.ja:
<voice 03558_00002060><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「ふむ。お前にしては　上出来だ。
　きっと　花嫁も　よろこぶだろう。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2060.ko:
<voice 03558_00002060><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 흠, 너치고는 준비성이 좋구나.
　신부도 무척 기뻐할 거다.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2060.zh-Hans:
<voice 03558_00002060><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>嗯，你能做到这样算不错了，
新娘子一定会喜欢的。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2060.zh-Hant:
<voice 03558_00002060><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>嗯，你還真貼心呢，
新娘子一定會喜歡的。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2061.en:
<voice 03618_00002061><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Now then, Aashik,
 please give the shell to <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2061.ja:
<voice 03618_00002061><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「では　アーシク。
　その貝がらを　<pc>に。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2061.ko:
<voice 03618_00002061><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 그럼 아시크.
　그 조개껍데기를 <pc>에게 주거라.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2061.zh-Hans:
<voice 03618_00002061><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>那么，阿西克，
把你的贝壳交给<pc>吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2061.zh-Hant:
<voice 03618_00002061><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>那麼，阿西克，
把你的貝殼交給<pc>吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2062.en:
<voice 03788_00002062><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001><pc>, I want you to deliver
this to Keel at the Prayer Inn.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2062.ja:
<voice 03788_00002062><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「<pc>。この貝がらを　祈りの宿にいる
　ボクの花嫁キールに　届けてほしいんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2062.ko:
<voice 03788_00002062><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: <pc>
　이 조개껍데기를 기도의 여관에 있는
　내 신부 키르에게 전해 줘.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2062.zh-Hans:
<voice 03788_00002062><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001><pc>，我要请你帮我把这个贝壳
送去祈愿之所，给我的新娘琪尔。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2062.zh-Hant:
<voice 03788_00002062><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001><pc>，我要請你幫我把這個貝殼
送去祈願旅店，給我的新娘琪兒。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001539.en:
<pc> received the Beautiful Shell (Key Item)
from Aashik!<me 60>
19001539.ja:
<pc>は　アーシクから
キレイな貝がら（だいじなもの）を　受け取った！<me 60>
19001539.zh-Hans:
<pc>从阿西克手中
收下了漂亮的贝壳（重要物品）！<me 60>
19001539.zh-Hant:
<pc>從阿西克手中
收下了漂亮的貝殼（重要物品）！<me 60>

2064.en:
<voice 03948_00002064><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>I'm counting on you. This shell
carries the happiness of those two who
are honored at that memorial, okay?<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2064.ja:
<voice 03948_00002064><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「頼んだよ　<pc>。
　その貝がらには　慰霊碑に　まつられてる人の
　幸せも　こめられてるんだからね？<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2064.ko:
<voice 03948_00002064><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 잘 부탁해, <pc>.
　그 조개껍데기는 위령비에 잠들어 있는
　영혼의 행복을 기원하는 물건이기도 하니까.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2064.zh-Hans:
<voice 03948_00002064><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>拜托你了，<pc>。
这个贝壳里，也含有慰灵碑祭奠的
那些人的幸福哦！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2064.zh-Hant:
<voice 03948_00002064><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>拜託你了，<pc>。
這個貝殼裡，也含有慰靈碑祭奠的
那些人的幸福喔！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2065.en:
<voice 04088_00002065><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001><pc>. Bring the bride safely from
the Prayer Inn back to the village.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2065.ja:
<voice 04088_00002065><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ。花嫁キールを　祈りの宿から
　このレーンの村へと　無事に連れてくるのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2065.ko:
<voice 04088_00002065><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 신부 키르를 기도의 여관에서
　이곳 렌 마을까지 무사히 데려오거라.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2065.zh-Hans:
<voice 04088_00002065><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001><pc>啊，你要把新娘子琪尔从祈愿之所
安然无恙接到这个雷恩村来。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2065.zh-Hant:
<voice 04088_00002065><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001><pc>啊，你要把新娘子琪兒從祈願旅店
安然無恙接到這個雷恩村來。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2066.en:
<voice 04158_00002066><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>To get to the Prayer Inn, you'll need
to cross the Colt Region.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2066.ja:
<voice 04158_00002066><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「祈りの宿に行くには
　コルット地方を　越える必要がある。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2066.ko:
<voice 04158_00002066><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 기도의 여관으로 가려면
　코룻트 지방을 넘어야 한다.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2066.zh-Hans:
<voice 04158_00002066><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>想前往祈愿之所
就需要经过克鲁特地区。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2066.zh-Hant:
<voice 04158_00002066><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>想前往祈願旅店
就需要經過克魯特地方。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2067.en:
<voice 04258_00002067><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>When you leave the village, follow
the road. When that road crosses a
stream, follow that stream to the north.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2067.ja:
<voice 04258_00002067><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「まずは　村を出たら　道なりに進め。
　道が　小川と交わったら
　今度は　その小川に沿って　北を目指すのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2067.ko:
<voice 04258_00002067><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 우선 마을을 나가 길을 따라가거라.
　도중에 개울이 나오면
　그 개울을 따라 북쪽으로 가면 된다.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2067.zh-Hans:
<voice 04258_00002067><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>你出了村庄以后，先沿着路一直走，
等看到一条小河，
再沿着小河往北走。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2067.zh-Hant:
<voice 04258_00002067><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>你出了村莊以後，先沿著路一直走，
等看到一條小河，
再沿著小河往北走。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26954.en:
<voice 04363_00026954><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>That will lead you to a small waterfall.
Just after taking the road left into
Lenam Fields, look to your right.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26954.ja:
<voice 04363_00026954><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「そうすれば　小さな滝へ　たどり着く。
　その左側にある　レーナム緑野へ
　つながる道を越えたら　すぐ右側を見ろ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26954.ko:
<voice 04363_00026954><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 그러면 작은 폭포가 나올 거다.
　그 왼쪽에 있는 레남 녹지와
　연결된 길을 넘거든 오른쪽을 봐 보거라.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26954.zh-Hans:
<voice 04363_00026954><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>最后，你会来到一座小瀑布，
瀑布左侧有一条路
可以通到雷纳姆绿洲，抵达绿洲后你就往右边看。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26954.zh-Hant:
<voice 04363_00026954><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>最後，你會來到一座小瀑布，
瀑布左側有一條路
可以通到雷納姆綠野，走到綠野以後你就往右邊看。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26955.en:
<voice 04478_00026955><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>That's where you'll find the Prayer Inn.
The monsters there are stronger than
the ones around the village, so prepare well.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26955.ja:
<voice 04478_00026955><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「そこに建っているのが　祈りの宿だ。
　レーナム緑野の魔物は　村の周りより強いから
　準備をしっかりと　していくのだぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26955.ko:
<voice 04478_00026955><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 거기 서 있는 건물이 기도의 여관이다.
　레남 녹지의 마물은 마을 주변의 마물보다
　강하니 단단히 준비하고 출발해야 한다?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26955.zh-Hans:
<voice 04478_00026955><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>祈愿之所就在那里。
雷纳姆绿洲的怪物比村子周边的还要强，
一定要做好准备再去。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26955.zh-Hant:
<voice 04478_00026955><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>祈願旅店就在那裡。
雷納姆綠野的怪物比村子周邊的還要強，
一定要做好準備再去。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2068.en:
<voice 04558_00002068><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Now, Aashik. You need to return
home and await your bride.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2068.ja:
<voice 04558_00002068><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「では　アーシクよ。お前は家に戻り
　花嫁の到着を　待つのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2068.ko:
<voice 04558_00002068><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 그리고 아시크, 넌 집으로 돌아가
　신부가 도착하길 기다려라.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2068.zh-Hans:
<voice 04558_00002068><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>那么，阿西克，你就回家去
等新娘子来吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2068.zh-Hant:
<voice 04558_00002068><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>那麼，阿西克，你就回家去
等新娘子來吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2069.en:
<voice 04648_00002069><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Understood.
If you'll excuse me, chief.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2069.ja:
<voice 04648_00002069><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「はい　わかりました。
　それじゃ　失礼します　村長さん。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2069.ko:
<voice 04648_00002069><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 네, 알겠습니다.
　그럼 실례하겠습니다, 촌장님.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2069.zh-Hans:
<voice 04648_00002069><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>好的，我知道了。
那我就先回去了，村长。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2069.zh-Hant:
<voice 04648_00002069><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>好的，我知道了。
那我就先回去了，村長。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2070.en: <voice 04753_00002070><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Please take care of Keel, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2070.ja: <voice 04753_00002070><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「<pc>。キールのこと　よろしく！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2070.ko: <voice 04753_00002070><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 키르를 잘 부탁해!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2070.zh-Hans: <voice 04753_00002070><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001><pc>，琪尔就有劳你了！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2070.zh-Hant: <voice 04753_00002070><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001><pc>，琪兒就有勞你了！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5670.en: <voice 00211_00005670><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Thanks for being my Shellner, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5670.ja:
<voice 00211_00005670><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「ボクのシェルナーに　なってくれて
　ありがとう　<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5670.ko:
<voice 00211_00005670><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 내 셸너가 돼 줘서
　고마워, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5670.zh-Hans:
<voice 00211_00005670><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>你能成为我的舍纳，
真是谢谢了，<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5670.zh-Hant:
<voice 00211_00005670><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>謝謝你願意當我的傳貝護者，
<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5671.en:
<voice 00241_00005671><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Keel's waiting for you. Please pick her up
at the Prayer Inn as soon as possible.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5671.ja:
<voice 00241_00005671><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「キールが待ってるんだ。
　祈りの宿に　早く　迎えにいってあげてよ。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5671.ko:
<voice 00241_00005671><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 키르가 기다리고 있을 거야.
　어서 기도의 여관에 가서 데려와 줘.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5671.zh-Hans:
<voice 00241_00005671><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>琪尔正在等你呢。
请你快到祈愿之所去把她接来吧。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5671.zh-Hant:
<voice 00241_00005671><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>琪兒在等你，
快去祈願旅店接她吧。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5672.en:
<voice 00271_00005672><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>The Prayer Inn is northwest of the
village, but it's a long ways off, so be
careful! I'm counting on you, <pc>!!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5672.ja:
<voice 00271_00005672><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「祈りの宿は　この村の北西にあるけど
　だいぶ　遠いみたいだから　気をつけてね！
　頼んだよ　<pc>！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5672.ko:
<voice 00271_00005672><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 기도의 여관은 이 마을 북서쪽에 있는데
　꽤 먼 모양이니까 조심해서 다녀와!
　그럼 잘 부탁해, <pc>!!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5672.zh-Hans:
<voice 00271_00005672><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>祈愿之所在这村子的西北方，
不过有些远，要注意点安全呢！
拜托你了，<pc>！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5672.zh-Hant:
<voice 00271_00005672><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>祈願旅店就在這個村子的西北邊，
但有點距離，你要小心一點！
拜託你了，<pc>！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2071.en: <voice 00066_00002071><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>Well, it seems that the rumors were true.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2071.ja: <voice 00066_00002071><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「おお　ウワサをすれば　なんとやら。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2071.ko: <voice 00066_00002071><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: 오오, 말 끝나기 무섭게 오는군요.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2071.zh-Hans: <voice 00066_00002071><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>哦，正说到你呢。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2071.zh-Hant: <voice 00066_00002071><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>喔，說人人到。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2072.en:
<voice 00226_00002072><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>Welcome, Ms. Keel.
It's good to see you.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2072.ja:
<voice 00226_00002072><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「おかえりなさい　キールさん。
　ちょうどよいところに　戻られましたな。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2072.ko:
<voice 00226_00002072><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: 어서 오십시오, 키르 씨.
　마침 잘 오셨습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2072.zh-Hans:
<voice 00226_00002072><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>琪尔小姐，欢迎回来。
你回来得正好。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2072.zh-Hant:
<voice 00226_00002072><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>琪兒小姐，歡迎回來。
妳回來得正好。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2073.en:
<voice 00286_00002073><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>This is <pc> from Leen Village. They're
the one who will be acting as Shellner.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2073.ja:
<voice 00286_00002073><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「こちらは　レーンの村の　<pc>どの。
　シェルナーとして参られた　お方です。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2073.ko:
<voice 00286_00002073><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: 이쪽은 렌 마을의 <pc> 님이십니다.
　셸너 자격으로 오신 분이죠.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2073.zh-Hans:
<voice 00286_00002073><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>这位是雷恩村的<pc>大人，
他是来担任舍纳的。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2073.zh-Hant:
<voice 00286_00002073><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>這位是雷恩村的<pc>大人，
他是來擔任傳貝護者的。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2074.en:
<voice 00476_00002074><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>Oh, you're Aashik's... Thank you so
much for coming all this way.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2074.ja:
<voice 00476_00002074><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>「あなたが　アーシクさまの……。
　遠い所まで　ありがとうございます。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2074.ko:
<voice 00476_00002074><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>: 당신이 아시크 님의…….
　먼 곳까지 와 주셔서 감사합니다.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2074.zh-Hans:
<voice 00476_00002074><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>您就是阿西克大人的……
谢谢您到这么远的地方来。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2074.zh-Hant:
<voice 00476_00002074><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>您就是阿西克大人的……
謝謝您到這麼遠的地方來。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2075.en:
<voice 00496_00002075><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>My name is Keel.
I'm Aashik's bride-to-be.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2075.ja:
<voice 00496_00002075><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>「私は　キールと申します。
　アーシクさまの花嫁となる者です。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2075.ko:
<voice 00496_00002075><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>: 전 키르라고 해요.
　아시크 님의 신부가 될 사람이죠.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2075.zh-Hans:
<voice 00496_00002075><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>我叫琪尔，
是阿西克大人的未婚妻。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2075.zh-Hant:
<voice 00496_00002075><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>我叫做琪兒，
是阿西克大人的未婚妻。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2076.en:
<voice 00526_00002076><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>It's nice to meet you,
Shellner <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2076.ja:
<voice 00526_00002076><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>「よろしくお願いします。
　シェルナーの　<pc>さま。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2076.ko:
<voice 00526_00002076><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>: 부디 잘 부탁드려요.
　셸너 <pc> 님.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2076.zh-Hans:
<voice 00526_00002076><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>今后承蒙您多关照了，
舍纳<pc>大人。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2076.zh-Hant:
<voice 00526_00002076><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>今後承蒙您多關照了，
傳貝護者<pc>大人。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2077.en:
<voice 00566_00002077><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>Ever since the day I met my darling
Aashik in the town of Julet...<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2077.ja:
<voice 00566_00002077><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>「ジュレットの町を　おとずれていた
　アーシクさまと出会った　あの日から……。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2077.ko:
<voice 00566_00002077><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>: 주레트 마을에 오신
　아시크 님과 처음 만난 날부터…….<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2077.zh-Hans:
<voice 00566_00002077><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>自从在玖莱特镇遇到
阿西克大人的那一天起……<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2077.zh-Hant:
<voice 00566_00002077><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>自從在玖萊特鎮遇到
阿西克大人的那一天起……<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2078.en:
<voice 00586_00002078><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>I've waited so long for this day. Let's
leave for Leen Village right away!<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2078.ja:
<voice 00586_00002078><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>「今日の　この日を　どれだけ待ったことか。
　すぐにでも　レーンの村へと向かいましょう。　<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2078.ko:
<voice 00586_00002078><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>: 이 날만을 얼마나 기다렸는지 몰라요.
　당장 렌 마을로 출발하죠.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2078.zh-Hans:
<voice 00586_00002078><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>这一天我已经等好久了，
我们马上启程前往雷恩村吧。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2078.zh-Hant:
<voice 00586_00002078><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>這一天我已經等好久了，
我們馬上啟程前往雷恩村吧。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2079.en:
<voice 00626_00002079><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>Ms. Keel. I understand your excitement,
but first, you should follow tradition
and receive the groom's gift.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2079.ja:
<voice 00626_00002079><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「キールさん。はやる気持ちは　わかりますが
　まずは　しきたりに従って
　花婿からの結納品を　受け取りましょう。　<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2079.ko:
<voice 00626_00002079><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: 키르 씨, 조급한 마음은 이해합니다만
　우선 관례대로 신랑이 보낸
　예물부터 받으시지요.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2079.zh-Hans:
<voice 00626_00002079><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>琪尔小姐，我理解你的心情，
但还是应该依照惯例，
先收下新郎的聘礼才对。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2079.zh-Hant:
<voice 00626_00002079><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>琪兒小姐，我理解妳的心情，
但還是應該依照慣例，
先收下新郎的聘禮才對。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2080.en:
<voice 00690_00002080><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001><pc>. I believe the groom has entrusted
you with a shell for the betrothal gift.
Would you kindly hand it to Ms. Keel?<yesno><close><close><stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2080.ja:
<voice 00690_00002080><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「<pc>どの。花婿より　結納品となる
　貝がらを　預かっておるはず。
　それをキールさんに　渡していただけますかな？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2080.ko:
<voice 00690_00002080><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: <pc> 님, 신랑으로부터 예물인
　조개껍데기를 받아 오셨겠죠?
　그걸 키르 씨께 건네주시겠습니까?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2080.zh-Hans:
<voice 00690_00002080><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001><pc>大人，我知道您正替新郎
保管作为聘礼的贝壳。
可不可以请您将它交给琪尔小姐呢？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2080.zh-Hant:
<voice 00690_00002080><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001><pc>大人，我知道您正替新郎
保管作為聘禮的貝殼。
可不可以請您將它交給琪兒小姐呢？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2081.en:
<voice 00742_00002081><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>Ha ha ha. You must be joking. You
came here as the Shellner, after all.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2081.ja:
<voice 00742_00002081><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「はっはっは。ご冗談を。
　あなたはシェルナーとして　参られたはず。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2081.ko:
<voice 00742_00002081><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: 하하하, 농담도 잘하시는군요.
　당신은 셸너 자격으로 오신 것 아닙니까.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2081.zh-Hans:
<voice 00742_00002081><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>哈哈哈！您还真会开玩笑，
您应该是作为舍纳来到这里的吧。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2081.zh-Hant:
<voice 00742_00002081><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>哈哈哈！您還真會開玩笑，
您應該是作為傳貝護者前來這裡的吧。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2082.en:
<voice 00803_00002082><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>Then the Shellner will present the
bride, Keel, with her wedding gift.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2082.ja:
<voice 00803_00002082><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「では　シェルナーより　花嫁キールに
　結納品の貝がらの　贈呈を。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2082.ko:
<voice 00803_00002082><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: 그럼 셸너로부터 신부 키르에게
　예물인 조개껍데기 증정이 있겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2082.zh-Hans:
<voice 00803_00002082><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>请舍纳将聘礼贝壳
赠予新娘琪尔吧。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2082.zh-Hant:
<voice 00803_00002082><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>請傳貝護者將聘禮貝殼
贈予新娘琪兒吧。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29419.ja:
<pc>は　キールに
キレイな貝がらを　渡した！
29419.zh-Hans:
<pc>把漂亮的贝壳
交给了琪尔！
29419.zh-Hant:
<pc>將漂亮的貝殼
交給琪兒！

4245.en:
<voice 00976_00004245><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>So... This is the shell that
Aashik found for me...<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4245.ja:
<voice 00976_00004245><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>「まあ……。これが　アーシクさまが
　私のために見つけてくださった　貝がら……。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4245.ko:
<voice 00976_00004245><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>: 어머나……. 이게 아시크 님이
　절 위해 찾아 주신 조개껍데기…….<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4245.zh-Hans:
<voice 00976_00004245><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>哇……这就是阿西克大人
为我准备的贝壳……<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4245.zh-Hant:
<voice 00976_00004245><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>哇……這就是阿西克大人
為我準備的貝殼……<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2084.en:
<voice 01006_00002084><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>It's beautiful!
I can feel the purity of Aashik's
heart reflected in it...<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2084.ja:
<voice 01006_00002084><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>「なんて　美しいのでしょう！
　アーシクさまの心の清さが　そのまま
　この貝がらに　表れていますわ……。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2084.ko:
<voice 01006_00002084><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>: 세상에, 예쁘기도 해라!
　아시크 님의 맑은 마음이
　이 조개껍데기에서 고스란히 느껴져요…….<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2084.zh-Hans:
<voice 01006_00002084><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>真是太美了！
在这枚贝壳上，我仿佛
看到阿西克大人纯净的心灵。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2084.zh-Hant:
<voice 01006_00002084><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>真是太美了！
在這枚貝殼上，我彷彿
看到阿西克大人純淨的心靈。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7308.en:
<voice 01066_00007308><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001><center>...I found you.
My lovely...bride...<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7308.ja:
<voice 01066_00007308><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001><center>…………見つけた。
ぼくの　花……嫁…………。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7308.ko:
<voice 01066_00007308><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001><center>…………찾았다.
내…… 신부………….<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7308.zh-Hans:
<voice 01066_00007308><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001><center>……找到你了。
我的新……娘……<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7308.zh-Hant:
<voice 01066_00007308><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001><center>…………找到了。
我的……新……娘…………<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2086.en: <voice 01156_00002086><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>Th-that voice, it's...<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2086.ja: <voice 01156_00002086><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「い　今の声は……。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2086.ko: <voice 01156_00002086><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: 바, 방금 그 목소리는…….<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2086.zh-Hans: <voice 01156_00002086><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>刚、刚才的声音是……？<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2086.zh-Hant: <voice 01156_00002086><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>剛、剛才的聲音是……？<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2087.en: <voice 01206_00002087><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001><center>...Now, come with me...<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2087.ja: <voice 01206_00002087><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001><center>……さあ　ぼくと　一緒に行こう……。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2087.ko: <voice 01206_00002087><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001><center>……자, 나와 함께 가자…….<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2087.zh-Hans: <voice 01206_00002087><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001><center>快，和我一起走吧……<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2087.zh-Hant: <voice 01206_00002087><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001><center>快，和我一起走吧……<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2088.en:
<voice 01296_00002088><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>...Don't tell me a monster has gotten
into the Prayer Inn?! <pc>, the bride!<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2088.ja:
<voice 01296_00002088><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「……まさか　魔物が　この祈りの宿に！？
　<pc>どの……花嫁を！<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2088.ko:
<voice 01296_00002088><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: ……설마 마물이 이 기도의 여관에!?
　<pc> 님…… 신부를!<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2088.zh-Hans:
<voice 01296_00002088><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>怪物竟然出现在这个祈愿之所？！
<pc>大人……快保护新娘！<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2088.zh-Hant:
<voice 01296_00002088><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>怪物竟然出現在這個祈願旅店！？
<pc>大人……快保護新娘！<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2089.ja: <voice 01481_00002089><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001><center>…………ぼくの　花嫁…………。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2091.en: <voice 01596_00002091><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>I'm not your bride.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2091.ja: <voice 01596_00002091><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>「私は　あなたの花嫁では　ありません。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2091.ko: <voice 01596_00002091><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>: 전 당신 신부가 아니에요.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2091.zh-Hans: <voice 01596_00002091><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>我不是你的新娘。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2091.zh-Hant: <voice 01596_00002091><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>我不是你的新娘。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2092.en:
<voice 01736_00002092><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001><center>...Come, to Sunrise Beach.
We're going to be married...<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2092.ja:
<voice 01736_00002092><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001><center>…………さあ　行こう　来光の浜に。
ぼくたちは　結婚するんだ…………。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2092.ko:
<voice 01736_00002092><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001><center>…………자, 가자. 일출의 해변으로.
우리의 결혼식을 올리는 거다………….<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2092.zh-Hans:
<voice 01736_00002092><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001><center>…………走吧，去来光海滨。
我们一定会结婚的…………<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2092.zh-Hant:
<voice 01736_00002092><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001><center>…………走吧，去來光海灘。
我們一定會結婚的…………<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2093.en: <voice 02404_00002093><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>A b-black monster kidnapped Keel...?<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2093.ja:
<voice 02404_00002093><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「く……黒い魔物が
　キールさんを　さらっていった……？<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2093.ko:
<voice 02404_00002093><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: 거…… 검은 마물이
　키르 씨를 납치해 가다니……?<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2093.zh-Hans:
<voice 02404_00002093><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>黑……黑色的怪物
抓走了琪尔小姐……<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2093.zh-Hant:
<voice 02404_00002093><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>黑……黑色的怪物
抓走了琪兒小姐……<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2094.en: <voice 02442_00002094><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>D-don't tell me that monster is...<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2094.ja: <voice 02442_00002094><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「ま　まさか　あの魔物は……。　<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2094.ko: <voice 02442_00002094><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: 서, 설마 그 마물은…….　<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2094.zh-Hans: <voice 02442_00002094><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>那、那个怪物该不会是……<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2094.zh-Hant: <voice 02442_00002094><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>那、那個怪物該不會是……<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2095.en:
<voice 02508_00002095><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001><pc>! Do you know the story of the 
memorial on the beach?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2095.ja:
<voice 02508_00002095><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「<pc>どの！　<pc>どのは
　慰霊の浜の話を　ご存知か！？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2095.ko:
<voice 02508_00002095><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: <pc> 님! <pc> 님께서는
　위령의 해변에 얽힌 이야기를 아십니까!?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2095.zh-Hans:
<voice 02508_00002095><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001><pc>大人！您听说过
慰灵海滨的传说吗？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2095.zh-Hant:
<voice 02508_00002095><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001><pc>大人！您聽說過
慰靈海灘的傳說嗎？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2096.en:
<voice 02565_00002096><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>The spirit of a groom who lost his bride
to the sea is enshrined at that memorial.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2096.ja:
<voice 02565_00002096><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「慰霊の浜の慰霊碑には　海で花嫁を失った
　花婿の霊が　まつられているのです。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2096.ko:
<voice 02565_00002096><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: 위령의 해변에 있는 위령비에는
　바다에서 신부를 잃은
　신랑의 영혼이 잠들어 있습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2096.zh-Hans:
<voice 02565_00002096><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>慰灵海滨的慰灵碑中，寄宿着
在海边失去新娘的新郎亡灵。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2096.zh-Hant:
<voice 02565_00002096><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>慰靈海灘的慰靈碑中，寄宿著
在海邊失去新娘的新郎亡靈。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2097.en:
<voice 02585_00002097><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>Actually, the real name of Solace Beach
is Sunrise Beach.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2097.ja:
<voice 02585_00002097><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「じつは　慰霊の浜の本当の名は
　来光の浜というのです。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2097.ko:
<voice 02585_00002097><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: 사실 위령의 해변의 원래 이름은
　일출의 해변입니다.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2097.zh-Hans:
<voice 02585_00002097><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>其实，慰灵海滨
本来叫来光海滨。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2097.zh-Hant:
<voice 02585_00002097><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>其實，慰靈海灘
本來叫來光海灘。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2098.en:
<voice 02605_00002098><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>When the memorial was erected, the
beach came to be known as Solace
Beach, and its true name was lost.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2098.ja:
<voice 02605_00002098><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「花婿の霊を鎮める　慰霊碑が建ったことで
　慰霊の浜と呼ばれるようになり
　本当の名は　すたれてしまいました。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2098.ko:
<voice 02605_00002098><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: 신랑의 넋을 달래기 위해 위령비가 세워지자
　자연히 위령의 해변이라 불리게 되었고
　원래 이름은 잊히고 말았지요.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2098.zh-Hans:
<voice 02605_00002098><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>因为修建了新郎的镇魂碑——慰灵碑，
这里才改称为慰灵海滨，
真正的名字就被世人遗忘。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2098.zh-Hant:
<voice 02605_00002098><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>因為修建了慰靈碑來對新郎鎮魂，
這裡才改稱為慰靈海灘，
真正的名字就被世人遺忘。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2099.en:
<voice 02625_00002099><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>But that black monster
knew the name Sunrise Beach.
And he was seeking a bride, too...<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2099.ja:
<voice 02625_00002099><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「しかし　今の黒い魔物は
　来光の浜という名を　知っていました。
　しかも　花嫁を見つけた……と。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2099.ko:
<voice 02625_00002099><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: 하지만 방금 그 검은 마물은
　일출의 해변이란 이름을 알고 있었습니다.
　게다가 신부를 찾았다고 말했죠…….<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2099.zh-Hans:
<voice 02625_00002099><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>然而，刚才的黑色怪物
知道来光海滨这个名字，
而且还声称找到新娘……<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2099.zh-Hant:
<voice 02625_00002099><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>然而，剛才的黑色怪物
知道來光海灘這個名字，
而且還聲稱找到新娘……<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2100.en:
<voice 02655_00002100><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>In other words, is that monster the soul
of the groom who lost his bride on that
beach, who has now become an evil spirit?<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2100.ja:
<voice 02655_00002100><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「つまり　今の魔物は
　あの浜で　花嫁を失った花婿の霊が
　悪霊と化した姿ということでしょうか……。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2100.ko:
<voice 02655_00002100><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: 그렇다면 방금 그 마물은
　그 해변에서 신부를 잃은 신랑의 영혼이
　악령으로 변한 모습인 걸까요……?<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2100.zh-Hans:
<voice 02655_00002100><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>也就是说，刚才的怪物
可能就是那个失去新娘的新郎，
他的灵魂已经化为恶灵吗……<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2100.zh-Hant:
<voice 02655_00002100><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>也就是說，剛才的怪物
可能就是那個失去新娘的新郎，
他的靈魂已經化為惡靈嗎……<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2101.en:
<voice 02675_00002101><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001><pc>. Protecting the bride is an
important part of a Shellner's role.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2101.ja:
<voice 02675_00002101><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「<pc>どの。花嫁の身の安全を
　守ることは　シェルナーの大切な役目。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2101.ko:
<voice 02675_00002101><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: <pc> 님, 신부의 안전을
　지키는 것은 셸너의 중요한 임무입니다.<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2101.zh-Hans:
<voice 02675_00002101><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001><pc>大人，保护新娘安全
是舍纳的重要任务。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2101.zh-Hant:
<voice 02675_00002101><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001><pc>大人，保護新娘安全
是傳貝護者的重要任務。<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26956.en:
<voice 02695_00026956><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>Prepare for battle immediately and go
to Solace Beach! Please, save Ms. Keel!!<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26956.ja:
<voice 02695_00026956><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>「すぐに　戦いの準備をして　慰霊の浜へ！
　なにとぞ　キールさんをお救いください！！<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26956.ko:
<voice 02695_00026956><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>: 속히 전투 준비를 갖춰
　위령의 해변으로 가십시오!
　제발 키르 씨를 구해 주십시오!!<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26956.zh-Hans:
<voice 02695_00026956><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>马上做好作战的准备，前往慰灵海滨！
请无论如何都要救出琪尔小姐！<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26956.zh-Hant:
<voice 02695_00026956><start_lip_sync n00410 _normal m00001>馬上做好作戰的準備，前往慰靈海灘！
請無論如何都要救出琪兒小姐！<stop_lip_animation n00410 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2102.ja: <voice 00050_00002102><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「……ムダだよ。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2103.en: <voice 00081_00002103><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>You can't even scratch me.<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2103.ja:
<voice 00081_00002103><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「君たちじゃ　ぼくに
　キズひとつ　つけられやしない。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2103.ko:
<voice 00081_00002103><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 너희 힘으로는 내게
　상처 하나 낼 수 없어.<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2103.zh-Hans:
<voice 00081_00002103><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>你们根本
伤不了我。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2103.zh-Hant:
<voice 00081_00002103><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>你們根本
傷不了我。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2104.en:
<voice 00331_00002104><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>This dark power has allowed me to
meet my bride again...<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2104.ja:
<voice 00331_00002104><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「黒きチカラが　ぼくをふたたび
　花嫁に　会わせてくれた……。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2104.ko:
<voice 00331_00002104><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 검은 힘이 날
　신부와 다시 만나게 해 주었다…….<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2104.zh-Hans:
<voice 00331_00002104><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>黑暗的力量给予了我
再次和新娘见面的机会……<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2104.zh-Hant:
<voice 00331_00002104><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>黑暗的力量給予了我
再次和新娘見面的機會……<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2105.en:
<voice 00421_00002105><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>Yes...
I'm going to live with my bride forever...<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2105.ja:
<voice 00421_00002105><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「そうだ……。ぼくは　この花嫁と
　ふたりで　永遠に　暮らすんだ……。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2105.ko:
<voice 00421_00002105><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 그래……. 난 이 신부와
　둘이 함께 영원히 살 것이다…….<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2105.zh-Hans:
<voice 00421_00002105><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>没错……我会和我的新娘
两人永远厮守在一起……<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2105.zh-Hant:
<voice 00421_00002105><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>沒錯……我會和我的新娘
兩人永遠廝守在一起……<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2106.en: <voice 00521_00002106><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>So don't...get in my way!<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2106.ja: <voice 00521_00002106><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「だから　ジャマを……するな！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2106.ko: <voice 00521_00002106><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 그러니…… 날 방해하지 마라!<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2106.zh-Hans: <voice 00521_00002106><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>所以，别来……妨碍我！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2106.zh-Hant: <voice 00521_00002106><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>所以，別來……妨礙我！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2107.ja: <voice 00681_00002107><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>「アーシクさま！！<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2107.ko: <voice 00681_00002107><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>: 아시크 님!!<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2107.zh-Hans: <voice 00681_00002107><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>阿西克大人！！<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2107.zh-Hant: <voice 00681_00002107><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>阿西克大人！！<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2108.en:
<voice 00750_00002108><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Hyuza's going to be killed... And Keel's going to be
taken, too...<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2108.ja:
<voice 00750_00002108><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「ヒューザが　やられちゃう……。
　ボクのキールも　とられちゃう……。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2108.ko:
<voice 00750_00002108><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 휴자가 죽겠어…….
　나의 키르도 빼앗기고 말 거야…….<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2108.zh-Hans:
<voice 00750_00002108><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>修萨要被打败了……
我的琪尔也会被抢走……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2108.zh-Hant:
<voice 00750_00002108><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>修扎要被打敗了……
我的琪兒也會被搶走……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2109.en: <voice 00940_00002109><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>K...Keel is my bride...<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2109.ja: <voice 00940_00002109><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「キ……キールは　ボクの花嫁だ……。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2109.ko: <voice 00940_00002109><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 키…… 키르는 내 신부야…….<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2109.zh-Hans: <voice 00940_00002109><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>琪……琪尔是我的新娘……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2109.zh-Hant: <voice 00940_00002109><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>琪……琪兒是我的新娘……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2110.en: <voice 01030_00002110><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>KEEL IS MY BRIIIIIIDE!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2110.ja: <voice 01030_00002110><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「キールは　ボクの花嫁なんだぁぁぁっ！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2110.ko: <voice 01030_00002110><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 키르는 내 신부라고!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2110.zh-Hans: <voice 01030_00002110><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>琪尔是我的新娘！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2110.zh-Hant: <voice 01030_00002110><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>琪兒是我的新娘！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2111.en:
<voice 01110_00002111><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>Thanks to you, the shell that suppressed my
regret has been removed. I'm grateful
for that. But there can't be two grooms...<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2111.ja:
<voice 01110_00002111><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「君のおかげで　ぼくの無念を　抑えつける
　貝がらを　どかせたんだ。感謝してるよ。
　でも　花婿は　ふたりも　いらないんだよ……。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2111.ko:
<voice 01110_00002111><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 네 덕분에 내 원념을 억누르던
　조개껍데기가 사라졌다. 고맙다.
　하지만 신랑은 한 명이면 충분해…….<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2111.zh-Hans:
<voice 01110_00002111><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>多亏有你，我的怨恨
才能挣脱贝壳的束缚。我很感谢你。
不过，新郎不需要两个……<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2111.zh-Hant:
<voice 01110_00002111><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>多虧有你，我的怨恨
才能掙脫貝殼的束縛。我很感謝你。
不過，新郎不需要有兩個……<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2112.en:
<voice 01360_00002112><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Crap! I found the monster that took
Keel and chased after it, but I'm
totally helpless against this thing...<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2112.ja:
<voice 01360_00002112><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「くそっ！　キールをさらった魔物を見つけて
　追いかけてきたが　このオレが
　まったく　歯が立たねえとはな……。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2112.ko:
<voice 01360_00002112><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 제기랄! 키르를 납치한 마물을 찾아내
　따라오긴 했지만 내 실력으로도
　전혀 상대가 안 될 줄이야…….<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2112.zh-Hans:
<voice 01360_00002112><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>可恶！好不容易找到掳走琪尔的怪物，
追到这里，结果
我却束手无策……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2112.zh-Hant:
<voice 01360_00002112><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>可惡！好不容易找到擄走琪兒的怪物，
追到這裡，結果
我卻束手無策……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26957.en:
<voice 01460_00026957><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Aashik... I shouldn't have brought you along. Save
yourself, run away!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26957.ja:
<voice 01460_00026957><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「アーシク　すまん……。
　一緒に　連れてくるべきじゃなかった。
　お前だけでも　逃げてくれ！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26957.ko:
<voice 01460_00026957><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 아시크, 미안하다…….
　널 데려오는 게 아니었어.
　너만이라도 도망쳐!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26957.zh-Hans:
<voice 01460_00026957><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>阿西克，抱歉……
我不应该把你带到这里，
你一个人逃跑吧！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26957.zh-Hant:
<voice 01460_00026957><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>阿西克，抱歉……
我不應該把你帶來這裡的，
你一個人逃跑吧！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2113.en: <voice 01575_00002113><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>L-LET GO OF KEEL!!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2113.ja: <voice 01575_00002113><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「キ　キールを　はなせぇぇっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2113.ko: <voice 01575_00002113><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 키, 키르를 풀어 줘!!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2113.zh-Hans: <voice 01575_00002113><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>快、快放开琪尔！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2113.zh-Hant: <voice 01575_00002113><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>快、快放開琪兒！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2114.en: <voice 01700_00002114><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>I won't let anyone have Dahlia!<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2114.ja: <voice 01700_00002114><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「ダーリアは　誰にも渡さない！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2114.ko: <voice 01700_00002114><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 달리아는 아무에게도 못 넘긴다!<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2114.zh-Hans: <voice 01700_00002114><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>我绝不会把达利娅交给任何人！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2114.zh-Hant: <voice 01700_00002114><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>我絕不會把妲莉亞交給任何人！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2115.en: <voice 02005_00002115><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>...You're...a Shellner, right?<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2115.ja: <voice 02005_00002115><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「……君は　シェルナーだったね。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2115.zh-Hans: <voice 02005_00002115><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>……你是舍纳吧？<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2115.zh-Hant: <voice 02005_00002115><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>……你是傳貝護者吧？<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2116.en:
<voice 02055_00002116><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>How fitting. I'll take you with me. Even if it's by
force.<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2116.ja:
<voice 02055_00002116><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「ちょうどいい。君も連れていこう。
　チカラずくでもね。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2116.ko:
<voice 02055_00002116><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 마침 잘됐군. 너도 데려가야겠다.
　억지로라도 말이지.<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2116.zh-Hans:
<voice 02055_00002116><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>那正好，把你也带走好了。
就算要用蛮力我也在所不惜。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2116.zh-Hant:
<voice 02055_00002116><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>那正好，把你也帶走好了。
就算要用蠻力我也在所不惜。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2117.en: <voice 02115_00002117><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>Then we're going to have a wedding! Our wedding!!<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2117.ja:
<voice 02115_00002117><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「そして　式を挙げるんだ！
　ぼくたちの結婚式を！！　<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2117.ko:
<voice 02115_00002117><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 그리고 결혼식을 올릴 거다!
　우리의 결혼식을!! <stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2117.zh-Hans:
<voice 02115_00002117><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>然后要举行仪式！
举行我们的婚礼！！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2117.zh-Hant:
<voice 02115_00002117><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>然後要舉行儀式！
舉行我們的婚禮！！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2118.en: <voice 00030_00002118><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>I'm growing tired of wasting time with you...<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2118.ja:
<voice 00030_00002118><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「そろそろ　君たち相手に
　時間をつぶすのに　あきてきたよ……。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2118.ko:
<voice 00030_00002118><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 이제 슬슬 너희를 상대하며
　시간을 죽이는 것도 지겹군…….<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2118.zh-Hans:
<voice 00030_00002118><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>我已经和你们
玩腻了……<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2118.zh-Hant:
<voice 00030_00002118><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>我已經和你們
玩膩了……<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2119.en:
<voice 00296_00002119><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>...Hey, where have you been?
I've been waiting for you.<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2119.ja:
<voice 00296_00002119><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「……やあ　どこへ行っていたのかな？
　君を　待っていたんだよ。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2119.ko:
<voice 00296_00002119><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: ……이봐, 어디 갔었던 거냐?
　널 기다리고 있었다.<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2119.zh-Hans:
<voice 00296_00002119><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>……嗨，你上哪去了？
我等你好久啰。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2119.zh-Hant:
<voice 00296_00002119><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>……嗨，你上哪去了？
我等你好久囉。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2120.en:
<voice 00365_00002120><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>We can't have a wedding without
a Shellner... Now, come with me!<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2120.ja:
<voice 00365_00002120><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「シェルナーの　君がいないと
　ぼくたちの結婚式が　できないからね……。
　さあ　ぼくと　一緒に来てもらおうか！　<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2120.ko:
<voice 00365_00002120><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 셸너인 네가 없으면
　우리의 결혼식을 올릴 수 없으니까…….
　자, 나와 함께 가 줘야겠다! <stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2120.zh-Hans:
<voice 00365_00002120><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>少了你这个舍纳，
我们就没办法举行婚礼……
好，快点跟我走吧。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2120.zh-Hant:
<voice 00365_00002120><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>少了你這個傳貝護者，
我們就沒辦法舉行婚禮……
好，快點跟我走吧。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2121.ja: <shake_camera 2><voice 00035_00002121><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「ぐ……ぐおおおお！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2121.ko: <shake_camera 2><voice 00035_00002121><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 윽…… 으아아아!<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2121.zh-Hans: <shake_camera 2><voice 00035_00002121><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>唔……唔哦哦哦哦！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2121.zh-Hant: <shake_camera 2><voice 00035_00002121><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>唔……唔喔喔喔喔！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2122.en:
<voice 00092_00002122><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>No... Please, no...
I don't want to lose my bride again!<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2122.ja:
<voice 00092_00002122><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「イヤだ……イヤだ……。
　花嫁を失うのは　もうイヤだ！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2122.ko:
<voice 00092_00002122><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 안 돼…… 안 돼…….
　이제 다시는 신부를 잃고 싶지 않아!<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2122.zh-Hans:
<voice 00092_00002122><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>不要……我不要……
我不想再失去新娘了！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2122.zh-Hant:
<voice 00092_00002122><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>不要……我不要……
我不想再失去新娘了！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2123.en: <voice 00158_00002123><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>I WISH YOU'D ALL JUST DISAPPEAR!<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2123.ja: <shake_camera 2><voice 00158_00002123><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「みんな　消えてしまえばいい！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2123.ko: <shake_camera 2><voice 00158_00002123><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 네놈들 전부 없애 주마!<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2123.zh-Hans: <shake_camera 2><voice 00158_00002123><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>全都消失吧！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2123.zh-Hant: <shake_camera 2><voice 00158_00002123><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>你們全都消失吧！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2124.en: <voice 00259_00002124><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>Then Dahlia and I...<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2124.ja: <voice 00259_00002124><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「そうすれば　ぼくとダーリアを……。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2124.ko: <voice 00259_00002124><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 그러면 나와 달리아를…….<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2124.zh-Hans: <voice 00259_00002124><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>这样一来，我和达利娅……<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2124.zh-Hant: <voice 00259_00002124><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>這樣一來，我和妲莉亞……<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2125.en: <voice 00320_00002125><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>NO ONE WOULD GET IN OUR WAY!!<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2125.ja: <voice 00320_00002125><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「ふたりをジャマする者は　いなくなる！！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2125.ko: <voice 00320_00002125><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 우리를 방해하는 놈들은 사라지겠지!!<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2125.zh-Hans: <voice 00320_00002125><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>再也不会有人妨碍我们了！！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2125.zh-Hant: <voice 00320_00002125><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>再也不會有人妨礙我們了！！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2126.en:
<voice 00378_00002126><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>Dark power, hear my plea! Call down a storm!
BLOW EVERYTHING AWAAAAAAY!!<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2126.ja:
<shake_camera 2><voice 00378_00002126><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「黒いチカラよっ　ぼくの願いを聞け！
　嵐を呼べ！　すべてを吹き飛ばせぇぇぇっ！！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2126.ko:
<shake_camera 2><voice 00378_00002126><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 검은 힘이여, 내 소원을 들어다오!
　폭풍을 일으켜라! 모든 걸 날려버리는 거다!!<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2126.zh-Hans:
<shake_camera 2><voice 00378_00002126><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>黑暗的力量啊！倾听我的愿望！
召来风暴吧！把一切都吹垮吧！！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2126.zh-Hant:
<shake_camera 2><voice 00378_00002126><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>黑暗的力量啊！傾聽我的願望！
召來風暴吧！把一切全都吹垮吧！！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2127.ja:
<shake_camera 2><voice 00706_00002127><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「あはははっ。
　ひゃはははははははっっっ！！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2127.ko:
<shake_camera 2><voice 00706_00002127><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 으하하하!
　아하하하하하하하!!<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2127.zh-Hans:
<shake_camera 2><voice 00706_00002127><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>啊哈哈哈！
呀哈哈哈哈哈哈！！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2127.zh-Hant:
<shake_camera 2><voice 00706_00002127><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>啊哈哈哈！
呀哈哈哈哈哈哈！！<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26972.en: <voice 00820_00026972><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>What's this? Something's coming...<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26972.ja: <shake_camera 2><voice 00820_00026972><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>「なんだ？　何かが来る……。<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26972.ko: <shake_camera 2><voice 00820_00026972><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>: 뭐지? 뭔가가 오고 있어…….<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26972.zh-Hans: <shake_camera 2><voice 00820_00026972><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>是什么？有东西靠近……<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26972.zh-Hant: <shake_camera 2><voice 00820_00026972><start_lip_sync m50015 _normal m00001>是什麼？有東西靠近……<stop_lip_animation m50015 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7309.en:
<voice 04062_00007309><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>Thank goodness, you're unhurt.
My name is Reg. I need to apologize...<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7309.ja:
<voice 04062_00007309><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>「よかった。ケガはないようだ。
　ぼくの名前は　レグ。
　あなたに　あやまらなくては……。<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7309.ko:
<voice 04062_00007309><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>: 다행이야. 다친 곳은 없는 것 같군.
　내 이름은 레구.
　당신에게 사과해야 해…….<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7309.zh-Hans:
<voice 04062_00007309><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>太好了，你没受伤。
我叫莱格，
我必须向你道歉……<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7309.zh-Hant:
<voice 04062_00007309><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>太好了，看來你沒有受傷。
我的名字叫做雷格。
我必須向你道歉……<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26958.en:
<voice 04186_00026958><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>...I finally woke up. Did I try to force
you to become my bride...?<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26958.ja:
<voice 04186_00026958><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>「……ようやく　目が覚めた。
　ぼくは　あなたを　むりやり
　自分の花嫁に　しようとしていたのか……。<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26958.ko:
<voice 04186_00026958><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>: ……이제야 정신이 들었어.
　내가 당신을 억지로
　신부로 삼으려 했던 건가…….<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26958.zh-Hans:
<voice 04186_00026958><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>……我终于清醒了。
我是不是还强迫你
要当我的新娘呢……？<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26958.zh-Hant:
<voice 04186_00026958><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>……我終於清醒了。
我是不是還強迫妳
要當我的新娘呢……？<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2129.en:
<voice 04333_00002129><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>...I'm sorry.
I'm not your bride...<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2129.ja:
<voice 04333_00002129><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>「……ごめんなさい。
　私は　あなたの花嫁では　ありません……。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2129.ko:
<voice 04333_00002129><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>: ……미안해요.
　전 당신의 신부가 아니에요…….<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2129.zh-Hans:
<voice 04333_00002129><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>……对不起，
我不是你的新娘……<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2129.zh-Hant:
<voice 04333_00002129><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>……對不起，
我不是你的新娘……<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7310.en:
<voice 04748_00007310><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>...Forgive me.
I couldn't stop myself.
My heart was in darkness...<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7310.ja:
<voice 04748_00007310><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>「……すまない。
　自分を　止められなかった。
　ぼくの心は　黒い闇に包まれていたんだ……。<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7310.ko:
<voice 04748_00007310><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>: ……미안하다.
　스스로를 막지 못했어.
　내 마음은 검은 어둠에 휩싸여 있었지…….<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7310.zh-Hans:
<voice 04748_00007310><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>……对不起。
我无法控制自己。
我的心一直沉浸在一片黑暗中……<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7310.zh-Hant:
<voice 04748_00007310><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>……抱歉，
我阻止不了自己。
我的心被黑暗籠罩了……<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7311.en:
<voice 04860_00007311><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>I can't believe that I tried to use you to
replace my dearly departed Dahlia...
I'm...<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7311.ja:
<voice 04860_00007311><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>「君を　死んでしまったダーリアの
　代わりにしようとしていたなんて……
　ぼくは……。<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7311.ko:
<voice 04860_00007311><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>: 죽은 달리아의 빈자리를
　너로 채우려 했다니……
　난…….<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7311.zh-Hans:
<voice 04860_00007311><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>竟然想让你代替死去的达利娅……
我都做了什么啊……<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7311.zh-Hant:
<voice 04860_00007311><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>竟然想用妳來代替
已經死去的妲莉亞……
我……<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7312.en: <voice 05011_00007312><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>Reg... I'm right here...<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7312.ja: <voice 05011_00007312><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>レグ……。私は　ここにいます……。<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7312.ko: <voice 05011_00007312><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>레구……. 나는 여기 있어요…….<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7312.zh-Hans: <voice 05011_00007312><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>莱格……我在这里……<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7312.zh-Hant: <voice 05011_00007312><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>雷格……我就在這裡……<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2133.ja: <voice 05145_00002133><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>「ダ……ダーリア？<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2133.ko: <voice 05145_00002133><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>: 다…… 달리아?<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2133.zh-Hans: <voice 05145_00002133><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>达……达利娅？<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2133.zh-Hant: <voice 05145_00002133><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>妲……妲莉亞？<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2134.en: <voice 05222_00002134><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001>...Let's go. To where we belong...<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2134.ja:
<voice 05222_00002134><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001>「……行きましょう。
　私たちは　私たちの行くべき場所へ……。<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2134.ko:
<voice 05222_00002134><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001>: ……그만 가요.
　우리가 가야 할 곳으로…….<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2134.zh-Hans:
<voice 05222_00002134><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001>……走吧，
到我们该去的地方……<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2134.zh-Hant:
<voice 05222_00002134><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001>……走吧，
到我們該去的地方……<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2135.en: <voice 05680_00002135><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>Oh, Dahlia... I'll never leave you again...<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2135.ja:
<voice 05680_00002135><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>「ああ　ダーリア……。
　もう絶対に　離れないよ……。<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2135.ko:
<voice 05680_00002135><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>: 아아, 달리아…….
　이제 다시는 네 손을 놓지 않겠어…….<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2135.zh-Hans:
<voice 05680_00002135><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>啊，达利娅……
我不会再离开你了……<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2135.zh-Hant:
<voice 05680_00002135><start_lip_sync n00335 _normal m00001>啊，妲莉亞……
我不會再離開妳了……<stop_lip_animation n00335 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2136.en:
<voice 05925_00002136><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>...In this wide ocean world
we two met.<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2136.ja:
<voice 05925_00002136><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>……この広い海の世界
あなたと私　ふたりが出会った。<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2136.ko:
<voice 05925_00002136><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>……이 드넓은 바다에서
당신과 나 두 사람이 만나…….<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2136.zh-Hans:
<voice 05925_00002136><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>……在这片汪洋大海中，
你和我相遇了。<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2136.zh-Hant:
<voice 05925_00002136><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>……在這片汪洋大海中，
你和我相遇了。<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2137.en:
<voice 06065_00002137><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>The small shell you gave me
shines stunningly in the sunlight...<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2137.ja:
<voice 06065_00002137><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>あなたがくれた　小さな貝がら
日の光の中　美しく輝いて……。<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2137.ko:
<voice 06065_00002137><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>당신이 준 작은 조개껍데기
햇빛 속에서 아름답게 반짝이네…….<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2137.zh-Hans:
<voice 06065_00002137><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>你送给我的小小贝壳，
在阳光下闪闪发光……<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2137.zh-Hant:
<voice 06065_00002137><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>你給我的小貝殼，
在日光下綻放美麗的光輝……<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2138.en:
<voice 06232_00002138><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>From now on, we'll...
be happy...together...<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2138.ja:
<voice 06232_00002138><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>これから　ふたり……。
しあ……わせを……。<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2138.ko:
<voice 06232_00002138><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>앞으로 두 사람은…….
행복……을…….<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2138.zh-Hans:
<voice 06232_00002138><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>今后两人……
会永远……幸福……<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2138.zh-Hant:
<voice 06232_00002138><start_lip_sync n00336 _normal m00001><center>今後兩人……
永遠……幸福……<stop_lip_animation n00336 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2139.en:
<voice 06575_00002139><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>It's the Song of Return.
An old Weddie tradition...<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2139.ja:
<voice 06575_00002139><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「返し歌だ。
　ウェディの古い……な。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2139.ko:
<voice 06575_00002139><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 그건 답가다.
　웨디의 아주 오래된…….<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2139.zh-Hans:
<voice 06575_00002139><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>是歌谣。
是维迪自古流传下来的……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2139.zh-Hant:
<voice 06575_00002139><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>是歌謠。
是維迪自古流傳下來的……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2140.en:
<voice 06874_00002140><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>It's sung by a bride to her groom
as thanks for his gift. This shell
was Reg's gift to Dahlia.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2140.ja:
<voice 06874_00002140><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「花嫁が花婿に　贈り物の礼として歌う。
　この貝がらは　レグという花婿が
　花嫁ダーリアに　贈ったものなのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2140.ko:
<voice 06874_00002140><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 예물의 답례로 신부가 신랑에게 불러 주는
　노래지. 이 조개껍데기는 레구라는 신랑이
　신부 달리아에게 선물한 것이다.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2140.zh-Hans:
<voice 06874_00002140><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>新娘收到新郎的礼物后，会唱歌来答谢新郎。
这个贝壳是一个叫莱格的新郎，
送给新娘达利娅的礼物。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2140.zh-Hant:
<voice 06874_00002140><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>新娘收到新郎的禮物後，會唱歌來答謝新郎。
這個貝殼是一個叫做雷格的新郎，
送給新娘妲莉亞的禮物。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2141.en:
<voice 07029_00002141><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>I was manipulated by
Reg's grudge and took the shell for myself...<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2141.ja:
<voice 07029_00002141><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「ボクは　レグさんの怨念に操られて
　その貝がらを　取っちゃったんだね……。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2141.ko:
<voice 07029_00002141><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 난 레구 씨의 원념에 조종당해
　그 조개껍데기를 주운 거구나…….<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2141.zh-Hans:
<voice 07029_00002141><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>我是被莱格的怨念所支配，
才会捡起这枚贝壳的吧……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2141.zh-Hant:
<voice 07029_00002141><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>我是被雷格的怨念所支配，
才會撿起這枚貝殼的吧……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2142.en:
<voice 07215_00002142><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>I've never messed with an
offering before in my life...<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2142.ja:
<voice 07215_00002142><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「お供えものに　手を出したことなんか
　これまで　一度もなかったし……。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2142.ko:
<voice 07215_00002142><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 공물에 손댄 적은
　지금껏 한 번도 없었으니까…….<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2142.zh-Hans:
<voice 07215_00002142><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>我以前从未擅自
动过任何供品……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2142.zh-Hant:
<voice 07215_00002142><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>我以前從未擅自
動過任何供品……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2143.en:
<voice 07342_00002143><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>But you could also say that because of
that, those two were able to meet again.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2143.ja:
<voice 07342_00002143><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>「でも　そのおかげで
　あの方たちは　もう一度
　出会うことができたとも　言えますわ。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2143.ko:
<voice 07342_00002143><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>: 하지만 그 덕분에
　그분들이 다시
　만났다고 볼 수도 있잖아요.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2143.zh-Hans:
<voice 07342_00002143><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>不过也正因为如此，
才给了他们两个
再次相遇的机会。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2143.zh-Hant:
<voice 07342_00002143><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>不過也正因為如此，
才給了他們兩個
再次相遇的機會。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2144.en:
