<voice 07462_00002144><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>So don't worry about it anymore.
Let's find our own happiness
together, darling.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2144.ja:
<voice 07462_00002144><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>「だから　もう　気に病まないで。
　私たちは　私たちの幸せを
　ふたりで探していきましょう　アーシクさま。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2144.ko:
<voice 07462_00002144><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>: 그러니까 그만 기운 내요.
　우린 우리의 행복을
　함께 찾아 봐요, 아시크 님.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2144.zh-Hans:
<voice 07462_00002144><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>所以请别再自责了。
我们一起去寻找属于
我们的幸福吧，阿西克大人。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2144.zh-Hant:
<voice 07462_00002144><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>所以請別再自責了。
我們一起去尋找屬於
我們的幸福吧，阿西克大人。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2145.en:
<voice 07517_00002145><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Thank you, Keel...
You're right. We'll be happy together!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2145.ja:
<voice 07517_00002145><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「ありがとう　キール……。
　そうだね。ふたりで　幸せになろう！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2145.ko:
<voice 07517_00002145><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 고마워, 키르…….
　그래, 둘이 함께 행복해지자!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2145.zh-Hans:
<voice 07517_00002145><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>谢谢你，琪尔……
你说的对，我们一定要过得幸福！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2145.zh-Hant:
<voice 07517_00002145><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>謝謝妳，琪兒……
妳說的對，我們一定要過得幸福！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2146.en:
<voice 07633_00002146><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Give it a rest, you two.
Save it for the wedding...<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2146.ja:
<voice 07633_00002146><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「おいおい　ふたりとも。
　そこから先は　結婚式で　やってくれよ……。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2146.ko:
<voice 07633_00002146><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 이봐, 너희 둘.
　나머지는 결혼식에서 해 주겠어……?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2146.zh-Hans:
<voice 07633_00002146><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>喂，你们两个，
后续还是留到婚礼上吧……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2146.zh-Hant:
<voice 07633_00002146><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>喂，你們兩個，
後續還是留到婚禮上再做吧……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2147.en:
<voice 07732_00002147><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>A-are you alright, Hyuza?
I'm sorry, for Keel's sake, you...<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2147.ja:
<voice 07732_00002147><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「だ　だいじょうぶ　ヒューザ？
　ごめんね　キールのために……。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2147.ko:
<voice 07732_00002147><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 괘, 괜찮아, 휴자?
　미안해, 키르를 위해 힘 써줬는데…….<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2147.zh-Hans:
<voice 07732_00002147><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>你、你没事吧？修萨。
抱歉，为了琪尔，你……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2147.zh-Hant:
<voice 07732_00002147><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>你、你沒事吧？修扎。
抱歉，為了琪兒，你……<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2148.en:
<voice 07826_00002148><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>It's not a big deal. Seems <pc>
got the best of me again, though.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2148.ja:
<voice 07826_00002148><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「このくらい　大したことねえが
　また　いいところを　<cs_pchero>に
　持ってかれちまったな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2148.ko:
<voice 07826_00002148><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 이 정도 상처야 별거 아니지만
　또 <cs_pchero>에게
　활약할 기회를 빼앗겼군.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2148.zh-Hans:
<voice 07826_00002148><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>这点小事不算什么，
只不过风头
又被<cs_pchero>抢走了啊。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2148.zh-Hant:
<voice 07826_00002148><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>這點小事不算什麼，
只不過風頭
又被<cs_pchero>搶走了啊。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001482.en:
<voice 07982_19001482><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>Don't be discouraged, Hyuza. 
<cs_pchero> was only able to arrive in
time because you bought time for them.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001482.ja:
<voice 07982_19001482><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「くさることはない　ヒューザよ。
　おぬしが　時間をかせいでくれたおかげで
　<cs_pchero>が　間に合ったのだからな。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001482.ko:
<voice 07982_19001482><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 아쉬워할 거 없다, 휴자.
　네가 시간을 벌어 준 덕분에
　{cs_pchero}|hpp(이,가) 너희를 구할 수 있었던 거니까.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001482.zh-Hans:
<voice 07982_19001482><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>不必消沉，修萨。
正是因为你争取到了时间，
<cs_pchero>才能赶来啊。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001482.zh-Hant:
<voice 07982_19001482><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>用不著沮喪，修扎。
正因為你爭取到了時間，
<cs_pchero>才能趕來啊。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2150.en:
<voice 08024_00002150><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>Come, let us return to the village. We
must hurry to prepare for the wedding.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2150.ja:
<voice 08024_00002150><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「さあ　村へ戻るとしよう。
　結婚式の準備を　急がねばならんぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2150.ko:
<voice 08024_00002150><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 자, 마을로 돌아가자꾸나.
　어서 결혼식 준비를 해야 하니까.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2150.zh-Hans:
<voice 08024_00002150><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>大家都回村子吧，
必须赶快准备结婚典礼。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2150.zh-Hant:
<voice 08024_00002150><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>大家都回村子吧，
必須趕快準備結婚典禮。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2151.en:
<voice 00090_00002151><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc>!Thanks so much for
saving Keel back at the beach!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2151.ja:
<voice 00090_00002151><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「あっ　<pc>！
　慰霊の浜では　キールを助けてくれて
　本当に　ありがとう！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2151.ko:
<voice 00090_00002151><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 아, <pc>!
　위령의 해변에서 키르를 구해줘서
　정말 고마워!!<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2151.zh-Hans:
<voice 00090_00002151><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>啊，<pc>！
真的很感谢你
在慰灵海滨救了琪尔！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2151.zh-Hant:
<voice 00090_00002151><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>啊，<pc>！
真的很感謝你
在慰靈海灘救了琪兒！！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2152.en:
<voice 00251_00002152><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>I came to say hello to Mr.
Balcha. It's thanks to you that
we're able to have our wedding.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2152.ja:
<voice 00251_00002152><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>「バルチャさまに　ごあいさつに来ました。
　私たちの結婚式が　できるのも
　すべて　<pc>さまの　おかげですわ。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2152.ko:
<voice 00251_00002152><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>: 벌처 님께 인사를 드리러 왔어요.
　저희가 결혼식을 올릴 수 있게 된 건
　다 <pc> 님 덕분이에요.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2152.zh-Hans:
<voice 00251_00002152><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>我来跟巴尔查大人打招呼了。
我们可以举办婚礼，
全都是<pc>大人的功劳。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2152.zh-Hant:
<voice 00251_00002152><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>我來跟巴爾查大人打招呼了。
我們可以舉辦婚禮，
全都是<pc>大人的功勞。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2153.en:
<voice 00542_00002153><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Well, we're going back home.
We have to find a new shell.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2153.ja:
<voice 00542_00002153><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「それじゃ　ボクたちは　家に戻ります。
　新しい貝がらも　見つけておかないと。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2153.ko:
<voice 00542_00002153><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 그럼 우리는 집으로 돌아갈게.
　새 조개껍데기도 찾아야 하니까.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2153.zh-Hans:
<voice 00542_00002153><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>那我们要回家了。
还得找到新的贝壳才行。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2153.zh-Hant:
<voice 00542_00002153><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>那我們要回家了。
還得找到新的貝殼才行。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2154.en: <voice 00771_00002154><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>Let's go, Keel.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2154.ja: <voice 00771_00002154><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「行こう　キール。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2154.ko: <voice 00771_00002154><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>: 가자, 키르.<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2154.zh-Hans: <voice 00771_00002154><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>走吧，琪尔。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2154.zh-Hant: <voice 00771_00002154><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>走吧，琪兒。<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2155.en: <voice 00836_00002155><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>Of course, darling.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2155.ja: <voice 00836_00002155><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>「はい　アーシクさま。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2155.ko: <voice 00836_00002155><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>: 네, 아시크 님.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2155.zh-Hans: <voice 00836_00002155><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>好的，阿西克大人。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2155.zh-Hant: <voice 00836_00002155><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>好的，阿西克大人。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2156.en:
<voice 01025_00002156><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>Well then, <pc>. There are many
things that I need to tell you...<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2156.ja:
<voice 01025_00002156><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「さて　<pc>よ。
　そなたには　伝えねばならぬことが
　いくつも　あるのだが……。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2156.ko:
<voice 01025_00002156><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: <pc>.
　네게는 해야 할 얘기가 많다만…….<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2156.zh-Hans:
<voice 01025_00002156><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>好，<pc>啊，
我有几件事必须
告诉你才行……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2156.zh-Hant:
<voice 01025_00002156><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>那麼，<pc>啊，
我有幾件事
必須告訴你才行……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2157.en:
<voice 01354_00002157><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>After the wedding ends without
incident, that is. Your role as
 Shellner isn't over yet.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2157.ja:
<voice 01354_00002157><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「それは　ふたりの結婚式が
　つつがなく　終わってからだ。
　シェルナーの役目は　まだ続いている。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2157.ko:
<voice 01354_00002157><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 얘기는 두 사람의 결혼식이
　무사히 끝난 뒤에 해 주마.
　셸너의 역할은 아직 끝나지 않았으니까.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2157.zh-Hans:
<voice 01354_00002157><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>但这要等两人的婚礼
顺利结束后再说。
舍纳的职责还没有结束。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2157.zh-Hant:
<voice 01354_00002157><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>但這要等兩人的婚禮
順利結束後再說。
傳貝護者的職責還沒有結束。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2158.en: <voice 01413_00002158><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>We must prepare for tomorrow, too!<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2158.ja:
<voice 01413_00002158><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「わしたちも　明日にそなえて
　準備をするとしよう！<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2158.ko:
<voice 01413_00002158><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 우리도 내일을 위해
　준비하자꾸나!<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2158.zh-Hans:
<voice 01413_00002158><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>我们也赶快做好
明天的准备吧！<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2158.zh-Hant:
<voice 01413_00002158><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>我們也趕快做好
明天的準備吧！<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2159.en:
<center><pc> and Balcha
prepared for the wedding.
2159.ja:
<center><pc>は　バルチャとともに
結婚式の準備に　はげんだ。
2159.ko:
<center>{pc}|hpp(은,는) 벌처와 함께
열심히 결혼식 준비를 했다.
2159.zh-Hans:
<center><pc>和巴尔查
一起努力做婚礼的准备工作。
2159.zh-Hant:
<center><pc>和巴爾查
一起努力做婚禮的準備工作。

2160.de: <center>Und so bricht ein neuer Tag an!

2161.en: <voice 01850_00002161><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>Groom Aashik... Bride Keel...<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2161.ja: <voice 01850_00002161><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>「花婿アーシク……。花嫁キール……。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2161.ko: <voice 01850_00002161><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>: 신랑 아시크……. 신부 키르…….<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2161.zh-Hans: <voice 01850_00002161><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>新郎阿西克……新娘琪尔……<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2161.zh-Hant: <voice 01850_00002161><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>新郎阿西克……新娘琪兒……<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>

6792.en:
<voice 01916_00006792><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>Do you swear that the love you
two share shall last forever?<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
6792.ja: <voice 01916_00006792><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>「ふたりの愛は永遠のものと　ここに誓うか？<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
6792.ko: <voice 01916_00006792><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>: 두 사람은 영원한 사랑을 맹세하겠는가?<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
6792.zh-Hans: <voice 01916_00006792><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>你们发誓永远深爱对方吗？<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
6792.zh-Hant: <voice 01916_00006792><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>你們願意發誓永遠深愛對方嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2162.ja: <voice 01995_00002162><start_lip_sync n00331 _normal m00001>「誓います！<stop_lip_animation n00331 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2163.ja: <voice 02055_00002163><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>「誓います。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7313.en:
<voice 02147_00007313><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>...God of the mother sea. Please allow
Aashik and Keel to become man and wife.<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7313.ja:
<voice 02147_00007313><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>「……母なる海の神よ。アーシクとキール。
　このふたりが　夫婦となることを認めたまえ。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7313.ko:
<voice 02147_00007313><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>: ……어머니이신 바다의 신이시여. 
　아시크와 키르.
　이 두 사람이 부부가 되도록 허락해 주소서.<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7313.zh-Hans:
<voice 02147_00007313><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>……大海母亲啊，
请您见证阿西克与琪尔二人结为夫妇。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7313.zh-Hant:
<voice 02147_00007313><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>……偉大的海神母親啊，這兩人是阿西克和琪兒，
請承認他們為夫妻吧。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2165.en:
<voice 02368_00002165><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>I wish for you both the blessings of the
great sea. And please bless us, in turn.<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2165.ja:
<voice 02368_00002165><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>「願わくば　ふたりに　大いなる海の恵みを。
　そして　祝福を与えたまえーい。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2165.ko:
<voice 02368_00002165><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>: 바라건대 두 사람에게
　위대한 바다의 은총과 축복이 있기를.<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2165.zh-Hans:
<voice 02368_00002165><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>希望两位能得到大海的恩惠，
并且得到祝福。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2165.zh-Hant:
<voice 02368_00002165><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>希望兩位能得到大海的恩惠，
並且得到祝福。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2166.en:
<voice 02717_00002166><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>The marriage ceremony shall be concluded
by a recitation from the bride, Keel.<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2166.ja:
<voice 02717_00002166><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>「花嫁キールの返し歌の詠じにより
　ふたりの婚姻の儀を　結ぶものとする。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2166.ko:
<voice 02717_00002166><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>: 신부 키르의 답가로
　두 사람의 결혼식을 마치겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2166.zh-Hans:
<voice 02717_00002166><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>新娘琪尔吟唱回应对方心意的歌曲，
两人就此完成结婚仪式。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2166.zh-Hant:
<voice 02717_00002166><start_lip_sync n00408 _normal m00001>新娘琪兒吟唱回應對方心意的歌曲，
兩人就此完成結婚儀式。<stop_lip_animation n00408 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2167.en:
<voice 02860_00002167><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>Yes, sir. In accordance with ancient
Weddie custom, I shall now recite
the Song of Return.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2167.ja:
<voice 02860_00002167><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>「はい。ウェディの古き　しきたりにより
　返し歌を　ここに詠じさせていただきます。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2167.ko:
<voice 02860_00002167><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>: 네, 웨디의 오랜 관례에 따라
　답가를 부르겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2167.zh-Hans:
<voice 02860_00002167><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>是，我将依照维迪的传统，
在这里吟唱回应对方心意的歌曲。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2167.zh-Hant:
<voice 02860_00002167><start_lip_sync n00333 _normal m00001>是，我將依照維迪的傳統，
在這裡吟唱回應對方心意的歌曲。<stop_lip_animation n00333 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2168.en: <voice 03080_00002168><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001><center>...In this wide ocean world, we two met.<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2168.ja:
<voice 03080_00002168><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001><center>……この広い海の世界
あなたと私　ふたりが出会った。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2168.ko:
<voice 03080_00002168><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001><center>……이 드넓은 바다에서
당신과 나 두 사람이 만나…….<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2168.zh-Hans:
<voice 03080_00002168><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001><center>……在这片汪洋大海中，
你和我相遇了。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2168.zh-Hant:
<voice 03080_00002168><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001><center>……在這片汪洋大海中，
你和我相遇了。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2169.en:
<voice 03380_00002169><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001><center>The small shell you gave me
shines stunningly in the sunlight...<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2169.ja:
<voice 03380_00002169><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001><center>あなたがくれた　小さな貝がら
日の光の中　美しく輝いている。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2169.ko:
<voice 03380_00002169><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001><center>당신이 준 작은 조개껍데기
햇빛 속에서 아름답게 반짝이네.<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2169.zh-Hans:
<voice 03380_00002169><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001><center>你送给我的小小贝壳，
在阳光下闪闪发光……<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2169.zh-Hant:
<voice 03380_00002169><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001><center>你給我的小貝殼，
在日光下綻放美麗的光輝。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2170.en:
<voice 03680_00002170><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001><center>From now on, we'll be together forever.
Hand in hand, forever.
Walk with me in joy.<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2170.ja:
<voice 03680_00002170><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001><center>これから　ふたりは　永遠に。
その手をたずさえ　永遠に。
幸せとともに　歩んでいこう。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2170.ko:
<voice 03680_00002170><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001><center>앞으로 두 사람은 영원히.
그 손을 잡고 영원히.
행복 속에 나아가리.<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2170.zh-Hans:
<voice 03680_00002170><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001><center>今后两人永远地
执彼之手，
和幸福共行。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2170.zh-Hant:
<voice 03680_00002170><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001><center>今後兩人永遠地
執彼之手，
和幸福共行。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2171.en: <center>Aashik and Keel's wedding ended without incident.
2171.ja:
<center>アーシクとキール。
ふたりの結婚式は　つつがなく　終わった。
2171.ko:
<center>아시크와 키르.
두 사람의 결혼식은 무사히 끝났다.
2171.zh-Hans:
<center>阿西克和琪尔
两人的婚礼顺利结束了。
2171.zh-Hant:
<center>阿西克和琪兒
兩人的婚禮順利結束了。

2172.en:
<center>A feast was held.
Some sang, some danced, and all the
people gave them their blessings.
2172.ja:
<center>そして　うたげが開かれた。
ある者は歌い　ある者は踊り
人々は　ふたりを祝福したのだった。
2172.ko:
<center>뒤이어 피로연이 열렸다.
누군가는 노래하고, 누군가는 춤추며
두 사람을 축복했다.
2172.zh-Hans:
<center>宴会开始了。
有人唱歌，也有人跳舞，
人们祝福着两人。
2172.zh-Hant:
<center>宴會開始了。
有人唱歌，也有人跳舞，
人們祝福著兩人。

2173.en:
<voice 04356_00002173><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Good gravy...
I'm so relieved that it all worked out.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2173.ja:
<voice 04356_00002173><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「やれやれ……。
　無事に終わって　ホッとしたぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2173.ko:
<voice 04356_00002173><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 후우…….
　무사히 끝나서 다행이구나.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2173.zh-Hans:
<voice 04356_00002173><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>哎呀呀……
事情顺利结束，可以放心了。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2173.zh-Hant:
<voice 04356_00002173><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>哎呀呀……
事情順利結束，可以放心了。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2174.en:
<voice 04510_00002174><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001><pc>! Your work as
Shellner was quite impressive.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2174.ja:
<voice 04510_00002174><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ。シェルナーとしての
　お前の　はたらきも　見事だったぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2174.ko:
<voice 04510_00002174><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 너도 셸너로서
　정말 잘해 주었다.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2174.zh-Hans:
<voice 04510_00002174><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001><pc>啊，身为舍纳，
你做得很棒。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2174.zh-Hant:
<voice 04510_00002174><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001><pc>啊，身為傳貝護者，
你做得很棒。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2175.en:
<voice 04632_00002175><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>I'm sure everyone will agree that you're
worthy of the Mark of Adulthood.
Here, give me your Adventure Log.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2175.ja:
<voice 04632_00002175><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「誰もが　この一人前の証を受けるに
　ふさわしいと　思うことだろう。
　ほれ。冒険の書を出せ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2175.ko:
<voice 04632_00002175><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 네게 이 모험가의 증표를 주는 걸
　반대하는 사람은 아무도 없을 거다.
　자, 모험의 서를 꺼내 보거라.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2175.zh-Hans:
<voice 04632_00002175><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>任谁都觉得你足够
收下这合格者的证明吧。
来，把冒险之书拿出来。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2175.zh-Hant:
<voice 04632_00002175><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>任誰都覺得你足夠
收下這合格者之證吧。
來，把冒險之書拿出來。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2176.en:
<voice 04997_00002176><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>That's that. You've received your mark.
Even if you go to a big town, you should
be fine on your own.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2176.ja:
<voice 04997_00002176><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「これでよし。お前は　一人前の証を得た。
　大きな町へ行ったとしても　ひとりで
　ちゃんと　やっていけるはずだ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2176.ko:
<voice 04997_00002176><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 좋아, 됐다. 이제 모험가의 증표를
　손에 넣었으니 큰 마을에 가더라도
　혼자서 잘 해낼 수 있을 거다.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2176.zh-Hans:
<voice 04997_00002176><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>这样就行了，你得到合格者的证明了。
就算一个人前往大城市，
应该也没问题。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2176.zh-Hant:
<voice 04997_00002176><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>這樣就行了，你得到合格者之證了。
就算一個人前往大型的市鎮，
應該也沒問題。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2177.en:
<voice 05192_00002177><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Old Man Balcha called for you, <pc>. He may
have some advice for the future. You should go see
him quickly.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2177.ja:
<voice 05192_00002177><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「バルチャ老が　<pc>を呼んでいたぞ。
　今後についての　助言でもあるのだろう。
　すぐに　行くがいい。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2177.ko:
<voice 05192_00002177><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 벌처 영감님이 너를 찾고 계시더구나.
　네 앞날을 위해 조언을 해 주시려는 거겠지.
　어서 가 보거라.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2177.zh-Hans:
<voice 05192_00002177><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>巴尔查长老在找<pc>你哦。
他大概会给你些对今后有帮助的建议，
你赶快过去吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2177.zh-Hant:
<voice 05192_00002177><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>巴爾查長老在找<pc>你喔。
他大概會給你些對今後有幫助的建議，
你趕快過去吧。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9584.en: <voice 05440_00009584><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Off you go.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9584.ja: <voice 05440_00009584><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「ほれほれ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9584.ko: <voice 05440_00009584><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 자, 어서.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9584.zh-Hant: <voice 05440_00009584><start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>好了好了。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2178.en:
<voice 00158_00002178><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>It was a good wedding... Aashik and
Keel have set off on a new path together.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2178.ja:
<voice 00158_00002178><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「よい結婚式だったな……。
　アーシクとキールは　新しい道を
　ふたりで　歩みだしたのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2178.ko:
<voice 00158_00002178><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 멋진 결혼식이었어…….
　아시크와 키르는 둘이 함께
　새로운 첫걸음을 내디뎠다.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2178.zh-Hans:
<voice 00158_00002178><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>很棒的婚礼……
阿西克和琪尔两人
走上新的人生道路了。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2178.zh-Hant:
<voice 00158_00002178><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>很棒的婚禮……
阿西克和琪兒兩人
走在新的人生道路上了。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2179.en: <voice 00270_00002179><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001><pc>. Now, it's your turn.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2179.ja: <voice 00270_00002179><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ。次は　おぬしの番だな。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2179.ko: <voice 00270_00002179><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 이제 네 차례다.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2179.zh-Hans: <voice 00270_00002179><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001><pc>啊，接下来轮到你了。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2179.zh-Hant: <voice 00270_00002179><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001><pc>啊，接下來輪到你了。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2180.en:
<voice 00301_00002180><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>...I found you at a young age and you lived here at 
Fiya Orphanage, where you always dreamt of finding
your parents.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2180.ja:
<voice 00301_00002180><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「……おぬしは　幼いころに　わしに拾われ
　このフィーヤ孤児院で　暮らしながら
　両親を探すことを　ずっと　望んでいた。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2180.ko:
<voice 00301_00002180><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: ……넌 어릴 적에 내게 거둬져
　이곳 퓌야 고아원에서 지내면서
　오랜 세월 친부모를 찾고 싶어 했지.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2180.zh-Hans:
<voice 00301_00002180><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>……你小时候被我收留，
在这个费娅孤儿院生活，
并一直想着要去寻找父母。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2180.zh-Hant:
<voice 00301_00002180><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>……你小時候被我收留，
在這個費婭孤兒院生活，
並一直想著要去尋找雙親。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2182.en:
<voice 00635_00002182><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001><pc>. Don't say a word, just look into this
mirror.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2182.ja:
<voice 00635_00002182><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ。何も言わずに
　この鏡を　のぞいてみるのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2182.ko:
<voice 00635_00002182><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 일단 잠자코
　이 거울을 봐 다오.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2182.zh-Hans:
<voice 00635_00002182><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001><pc>啊，你什么都别说，
看着这个镜子吧。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2182.zh-Hant:
<voice 00635_00002182><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001><pc>啊，你什麼都別說，
看著這個鏡子吧。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001472.en:
<voice 00908_19001472><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>This mirror reflects the truth; it is Ra's Mirror...
What...... As I suspected... But... Such a thing is.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001472.ja:
<voice 00908_19001472><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「この鏡は　真実を映す　ラーの鏡。
　……なんと…………やはり……
　しかし……こんな事が　あるとはな。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001472.ko:
<voice 00908_19001472><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 이 거울은 진실을 비추는 라의 거울.
　……이럴 수가………… 역시……
　하지만…… 어떻게 이런 일이…….<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001472.zh-Hans:
<voice 00908_19001472><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>这面镜子是能映照出真实的太阳神镜。
……没想到…………果然……
可是……居然会有这种事。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001472.zh-Hant:
<voice 00908_19001472><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>這面鏡子是能映照出真實的拉之鏡。
……沒想到…………果然……
可是……居然會有這種事。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2184.en:
<voice 01136_00002184><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>You are <pc> the Human, not <pc>
the Weddie, aren't you.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2184.ja:
<voice 01136_00002184><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「おぬしは　人間の　<pc>であって
　ウェディの　<pc>ではないのだな。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2184.ko:
<voice 01136_00002184><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 넌 인간 <pc>이지
　웨디 {pc}|hpp(이,가) 아닌 게로구나.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2184.zh-Hans:
<voice 01136_00002184><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>你是人类<pc>，
不是维迪<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2184.zh-Hant:
<voice 01136_00002184><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>你是人類<pc>，
不是維迪<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001473.en:
<voice 01221_19001473><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>You've come back from the dead in
another beings body. I don't know how
that happened, or why, but...<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001473.ja:
<voice 01221_19001473><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「他人の身体を得て　生き返った者か……。
　なにゆえ　おぬしの身に　そんな事が起こったか
　その理由は　わからんが……。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001473.ko:
<voice 01221_19001473><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 남의 몸을 빌려 부활한 존재라…….
　왜 네게 이런 일이 일어났는지
　그 이유는 모르겠다만…….<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001473.zh-Hans:
<voice 01221_19001473><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>通过他人身体起死回生之人吗……
为什么这种事情会发生在你身上，
理由也无从得知……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001473.zh-Hant:
<voice 01221_19001473><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>藉由他人身體起死回生之人嗎……
為什麼這種事情會發生在你身上，
理由也無從得知……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2186.en:
<voice 01254_00002186><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>The white light that illuminated the
world... It is said that it is the light that is
released when a Hero awakens.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2186.ja:
<voice 01254_00002186><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「この世界を照らした　白き光……。
　あれは　勇者が覚醒を迎えたときに
　放たれる光だと　言われておる。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2186.ko:
<voice 01254_00002186><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 이 세상을 비춘 하얀 빛…….
　그 빛은 용사가 각성했을 때
　뿜어져 나오는 빛이라고 들었다.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2186.zh-Hans:
<voice 01254_00002186><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>照耀着这个世界的白光……
听说那是勇者觉醒时
绽放的光芒。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2186.zh-Hant:
<voice 01254_00002186><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>照耀著這個世界的白光……
聽說那是勇者覺醒時
綻放的光芒。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2187.en:
<voice 01284_00002187><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>It must be fate that you came back to life
and are here in this village at the time
when that white light lit the world.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2187.ja:
<voice 01284_00002187><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「その白き光が　世界を照らした　この時に
　おぬしという存在が　生き返り
　この村に居合わせたのは　何かの運命だろう。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2187.ko:
<voice 01284_00002187><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 그 하얀 빛이 세상을 비춘 지금
　너와 같은 존재가 되살아나
　이 마을에 오게 된 것은 무슨 운명일 터.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2187.zh-Hans:
<voice 01284_00002187><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>在白光照耀世界的此刻，
你不仅重生，还出现在这个村子，
应该也是有缘吧。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2187.zh-Hant:
<voice 01284_00002187><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>在白光照耀世界的此刻，
你不僅重生，還出現在這個村子，
應該也是有緣吧。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2188.en:
<voice 01317_00002188><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>If that is the case, then I believe that seeking
out the place where that light originated
is the path that you should take.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2188.ja:
<voice 01317_00002188><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「ならば　その光が発せられた場所へ
　向かうことが　おぬしの進むべき道に
　ちがいないと　わしは思う。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2188.ko:
<voice 01317_00002188><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 그렇다면 그 빛이 뿜어져 나온 곳으로
　가는 것이 네가 나아갈 길이라고
　난 생각한다.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2188.zh-Hans:
<voice 01317_00002188><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>既然这样，我觉得你应该
朝着散发那道光芒的
地方前进。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2188.zh-Hant:
<voice 01317_00002188><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>既然這樣，我覺得你應該
朝著散發那道光芒的
地方前進。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2189.en: <voice 01347_00002189><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>Go forth, <pc>! Determine your destiny.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2189.ja:
<voice 01347_00002189><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「旅立て　<pc>よ。
　おぬしの運命を　見定めるのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2189.ko:
<voice 01347_00002189><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 떠나거라, <pc>.
　네 운명을 확인하는 거다.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2189.zh-Hans:
<voice 01347_00002189><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>踏上旅程吧，<pc>啊。
我要看看你的命运如何。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2189.zh-Hant:
<voice 01347_00002189><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>踏上旅程吧，<pc>啊。
我要看看你的命運如何。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000939.en:
<voice 01447_19000939><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>Go and make a name for yourself in many
lands. Then you shall be awarded Key
Emblems, medals in the shape of a key.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000939.ja:
<voice 01447_19000939><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「多くの国で活躍し　名を上げよ。
　さすれば　キーエンブレムという
　カギの形をした勲章を　与えられるだろう。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000939.ko:
<voice 01447_19000939><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 여러 나라에서 활약해 명성을 떨치거라.
　그러면 키 엠블럼이라는
　열쇠 모양의 훈장을 받게 될 것이다.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000939.zh-Hans:
<voice 01447_19000939><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>在不同的国家积累功绩，
就可以获得叫键徽的钥匙形的勋章。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000939.zh-Hant:
<voice 01447_19000939><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>在許多國家好好表現，提升名譽吧。
這麼一來，應該就能得到
鑰匙形狀的勳章──鑰徽。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9190.en:
<voice 01477_00009190><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>The Key Emblems are proof of your
strength. Let those keys guide you.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9190.ja:
<voice 01477_00009190><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「キーエンブレムは　おぬしのチカラの証。
　おぬしを導く　まさに　カギとなるはずだ。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9190.ko:
<voice 01477_00009190><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 키 엠블럼은 네 힘의 증표.
　널 이끌, 말 그대로 열쇠가 되겠지.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9190.zh-Hans:
<voice 01477_00009190><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>键徽是你力量的证明。
它一定会成为引导你的关键。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9190.zh-Hant:
<voice 01477_00009190><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>鑰徽是你力量的證明。
它一定會成為帶領你的關鍵。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2193.en:
<voice 01557_00002193><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>...<pc>. I, up to now, have been acting as
a parent for the young Weddie named <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2193.ja:
<voice 01557_00002193><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「……<pc>よ。
　わしは　これまで　<pc>という
　ウェディの若者の　親代わりをしてきた。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2193.ko:
<voice 01557_00002193><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: ……<pc>.
　난 지금까지 친부모를 대신해
　웨디 {pc}|hpp(을,를) 키웠다.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2193.zh-Hans:
<voice 01557_00002193><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>……<pc>啊，
我一直把<pc>这个
维迪年轻人当成自己的亲生骨肉。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2193.zh-Hant:
<voice 01557_00002193><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>……<pc>啊，
我一直把<pc>這個
維迪年輕人當成自己的親生骨肉。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2194.en:
<voice 01588_00002194><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>I want you to help me to find the Weddie <pc>'s
true parents. That's what they always wanted.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2194.ja:
<voice 01588_00002194><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「おぬしには　ウェディの　<pc>の
　本当の両親を　どうか見つけだしてほしい。
　それこそが　やつの念願だったのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2194.ko:
<voice 01588_00002194><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 네가 웨디 <pc>의
　친부모를 꼭 찾아 주었으면 좋겠구나.
　그것이 그 아이의 오랜 소원이었으니.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2194.zh-Hans:
<voice 01588_00002194><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>希望你找到维迪<pc>
真正的父母，
这才是那家伙的心愿。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2194.zh-Hant:
<voice 01588_00002194><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>希望你找到維迪<pc>
真正的雙親，
這才是那傢伙的心願。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26959.en:
<voice 01619_00026959><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>There are two clues... They had a faint
memory of a large castle, and that their
parents were researchers of some sort...<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26959.ja:
<voice 01619_00026959><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「手がかりは　ふたつ……。
　かすかに記憶にあった　大きな城の姿と
　両親が　何かの研究者であるらしいこと……。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26959.ko:
<voice 01619_00026959><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 단서는 두 가지…….
　어렴풋이 기억하는 거대한 성의 모습과
　부모가 연구자로 추정된다는 것…….<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26959.zh-Hans:
<voice 01619_00026959><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>线索有两个……
他隐约记得有一座很大的城，
还有自己的父母似乎是研究人员……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26959.zh-Hant:
<voice 01619_00026959><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>線索有兩個……
他隱約記得有一座很大的城，
還有自己的父母似乎是研究人員……<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2195.en:
<voice 01649_00002195><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>Of course, I pray that you shall
find your own destiny, as well.
You're my child now, after all.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2195.ja:
<voice 01649_00002195><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「もちろん　おぬし自身が　運命を見定めることも
　ここで　祈っておるぞ。
　おぬしも今は　わしの子なのだから。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2195.ko:
<voice 01649_00002195><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 물론 너 역시 무사히
　네 운명을 확인하길 기도하마.
　너도 이제는 내 자식이니까.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2195.zh-Hans:
<voice 01649_00002195><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>当然，我也会在这里祈祷，
希望你能看清楚自己的命运。
毕竟你现在也是我的孩子了。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2195.zh-Hant:
<voice 01649_00002195><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>當然，我也會在這裡祈禱，
希望你能夠看清楚自己的命運。
畢竟你現在也是我的孩子了。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

2196.en:
<voice 01709_00002196><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>Don't worry yourself with goodbyes.
First, head north to the town of Julet
on the neighboring island of Jule.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2196.ja:
<voice 01709_00002196><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>「別れの言葉はいらぬ。まずは
　北西へと向かい　となりのジュレー島にある
　ジュレットの町まで　行くがよい。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2196.ko:
<voice 01709_00002196><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>: 작별 인사는 필요 없다.
　우선 북서쪽으로 가 이웃한 주레섬의
　주레트 마을로 가거라.<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2196.zh-Hans:
<voice 01709_00002196><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>不需要说再见。
你就先朝西北前进，一路前往
隔壁玖莱岛的玖莱特镇吧。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
2196.zh-Hant:
<voice 01709_00002196><start_lip_sync n00407 _normal m00001>不需要說再見。
你就先朝著西北方前進，一路走到
隔壁玖萊島的玖萊特鎮吧。<stop_lip_animation n00407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7315.en:
<voice 00247_00007315><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pc>, you're leaving? Please, stay in this
village with everyone. Just like it's always been...<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7315.ja:
<voice 00247_00007315><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「<pc>　行っちゃうの？
　みんなと　一緒に　この村で暮らそうよ。
　これまでみたいに……。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7315.ko:
<voice 00247_00007315><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 떠나는 거야?
　다 함께 이 마을에서 살자.
　지금까지 그랬던 것처럼…….<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7315.zh-Hans:
<voice 00247_00007315><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pc>，你真的要走么？
像以前一样和大家一起
生活在村子里不好么……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7315.zh-Hant:
<voice 00247_00007315><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pc>，你要走了？
跟我們一起在這個村子裡生活嘛。
就像之前一樣……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001459.en:
<voice 00330_19001459><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>Rubeka. <pc> is leaving to find
their real parents. Anyone
would do that in their shoes.<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001459.ja:
<voice 00330_19001459><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>「ルベカ。<pc>は
　両親を探しにいくんだ。本当の親がいるなら
　誰だって　会いたいって思うよ。<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001459.ko:
<voice 00330_19001459><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>: 루베카, {pc}|hpp(은,는) 부모님을 찾으러
　가는 거야. 친부모님이 계신다는 걸 알면
　누구든 만나고 싶지 않겠어?<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001459.zh-Hans:
<voice 00330_19001459><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>露贝卡，<pc>要去寻找生身父母了。
父母尚在人间，
没有人不渴望见上一面的。<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001459.zh-Hant:
<voice 00330_19001459><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>露貝卡，<pc>要去尋找生身父母了。
只要父母尚在人間，
沒有人不渴望見上一面的。<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001460.en:
<voice 00330_19001460><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>Rubeka. <pc> is leaving to find
their real parents. Anyone
would do that in their shoes.<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>

　誰だって　会いたいって思うよ。<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001461.en:
<voice 00360_19001461><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>So we shouldn't stop them. We
have to send <pc> off with a smile.<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001461.ja:
<voice 00360_19001461><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>「だから　止めちゃいけない。
　ボクたちは　笑って
　<pc>を　見送ってあげなきゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001461.ko:
<voice 00360_19001461><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>: 그러니 붙잡지 말자.
　우린 웃는 얼굴로
　{pc}|hpp(을,를) 배웅해 줘야지.<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001461.zh-Hans:
<voice 00360_19001461><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>所以你不能阻止人家。
我们应该用笑容送<pc>上路的啊。<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001461.zh-Hant:
<voice 00360_19001461><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>所以妳不能阻止人家。
我們應該要面帶笑容地
為<pc>送行啊。<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001462.en:
<voice 00360_19001462><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>So we shouldn't stop them. We

7318.en:
<voice 00444_00007318><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001>It's all right, Rubeka.
I'm sure that <pc>
will come back to this village.<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7318.ja:
<voice 00444_00007318><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001>「ルベカさん　だいじょうぶですよ。
　<pc>さまは　きっと
　この村に　帰ってきます。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7318.ko:
<voice 00444_00007318><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001>: 루베카 씨. 걱정 말아요.
　<pc> 님은 분명
　이 마을로 돌아올 거예요.<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7318.zh-Hans:
<voice 00444_00007318><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001>露贝卡，不要难过。
<pc>大人肯定还会回到这村子里的。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7318.zh-Hant:
<voice 00444_00007318><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001>露貝卡，妳放心，
<pc>大人一定會
回來這個村子的。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001463.en:
<voice 00495_19001463><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Yeah... It's not like we won't see each
other again, right? Leen Village is where
you grew up. You can come back anytime!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001463.ja:
<voice 00495_19001463><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「うん……。もう　会えないわけじゃないよね。
　このレーンは　<pc>の育った村だもん。
　いつでも　帰ってきていいんだから！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001463.ko:
<voice 00495_19001463><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 응……. 다시 못 보는 건 아니니까.
　렌 마을은 {pc}|hpp(이,가) 자란 마을이니까
　언제든지 돌아와!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001463.zh-Hans:
<voice 00495_19001463><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>嗯……肯定还会见面的，
雷恩是养育<pc>长大的村子，
只要你愿意，随时都可以回来！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001463.zh-Hant:
<voice 00495_19001463><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>嗯……肯定還會見面的，
雷恩是養育<pc>長大的村子，
只要你願意，隨時都可以回來！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

you grew up. You can come back anytime!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

　いつでも　帰ってきていいんだから！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

　언제든지 돌아와!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7320.en:
<voice 00583_00007320><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>We'll be waiting for you
the day you return.<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7320.ja:
<voice 00583_00007320><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>「ボクたちは　ずっと　待ってるよ。
　<pc>が　帰ってくる日を。<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7320.ko:
<voice 00583_00007320><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>: 우린 계속 기다릴 거야.
　{pc}|hpp(이,가) 돌아올 그날을.<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7320.zh-Hans:
<voice 00583_00007320><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>我们会一直等着的，
等待<pc>回来的那一天。<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7320.zh-Hant:
<voice 00583_00007320><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>我們會一直等待。
等待<pc>歸來的那天。<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7321.ja: <voice 00633_00007321><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>「ねっ　キール？<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7321.ko: <voice 00633_00007321><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>: 그렇지, 키르?<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7321.zh-Hans: <voice 00633_00007321><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>是吧，琪尔？<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7321.zh-Hant: <voice 00633_00007321><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>對吧，琪兒？<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7322.en: <voice 00683_00007322><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001>Of course, darling.<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7322.ja: <voice 00683_00007322><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001>「はい　アーシクさま。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7322.ko: <voice 00683_00007322><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001>: 그럼요, 아시크 님.<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7322.zh-Hans: <voice 00683_00007322><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001>嗯，阿西克大人。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7322.zh-Hant: <voice 00683_00007322><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001>是的，阿西克大人。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7323.en:
<voice 00762_00007323><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001>If you ever stop in the town of Julet on
your travels, please ask around for my
parents' house. I've told them about you.<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7323.ja:
<voice 00762_00007323><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001>「旅先でジュレットの町に　立ち寄りましたら
　ぜひ　私の実家を　おたずねください。
　<pc>さまのことは　伝えてありますわ。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7323.ko:
<voice 00762_00007323><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001>: 여행 중에 주레트 마을에 들르시게 되면
　꼭 제 고향집을 방문해 주세요.
　<pc> 님의 이야기를 해 둘게요.<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7323.zh-Hans:
<voice 00762_00007323><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001>要是您在旅途中路过玖莱特镇的话，
请到我的娘家去做客吧。
我跟他们说过关于<pc>大人的事了。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7323.zh-Hant:
<voice 00762_00007323><start_lip_sync n00334 _normal m00001>旅途中如果有經過玖萊特鎮，
請務必到我的老家拜訪。
我已經把<pc>大人的事情告訴家裡了。<stop_lip_animation n00334 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7324.en: <voice 00852_00007324><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pc>! I'll be waiting for a souvenir!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7324.ja: <voice 00852_00007324><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「<pc>！　おみやげ　待ってるから！！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7324.ko: <voice 00852_00007324><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: <pc>! 선물 기대할게!!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7324.zh-Hans: <voice 00852_00007324><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pc>！我会等你带特产回来的！！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7324.zh-Hant: <voice 00852_00007324><start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pc>！我等你帶土產回來喔！！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7325.en: <voice 00990_00007325><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>Rubeka was crying, huh? Jeez......<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7325.ja:
<voice 00990_00007325><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>「ルベカ　泣いちゃったかな？
　やれやれ……。<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7325.ko:
<voice 00990_00007325><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>: 루베카, 설마 우는 거야?
　나 참…….<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7325.zh-Hans:
<voice 00990_00007325><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>露贝卡哭了么？
哎呀……<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7325.zh-Hant:
<voice 00990_00007325><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>露貝卡哭了嗎？
真是的……<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7326.en: <voice 01065_00007326><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>Well, take care, <pc>! See you soon!<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7326.ja:
<voice 01065_00007326><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>「それじゃ　<pc>　元気でね！
　いってらっしゃいっ。<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7326.ko:
<voice 01065_00007326><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>: 그럼 <pc>, 건강해야 해!
　잘 다녀와.<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7326.zh-Hans:
<voice 01065_00007326><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>那么再见了，<pc>，保重身体！
祝你一路顺风。<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7326.zh-Hant:
<voice 01065_00007326><start_lip_sync n00332 _normal m00001>那麼，<pc>，要保重喔！
路上小心！<stop_lip_animation n00332 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7327.en: <voice 01362_00007327><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Same as ever, those three.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7327.ja: <voice 01362_00007327><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「相変わらずだな　あいつらは。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7327.ko: <voice 01362_00007327><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 여전하네, 저 녀석들은.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7327.zh-Hans: <voice 01362_00007327><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>还是老样子啊，那帮家伙。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7327.zh-Hant: <voice 01362_00007327><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>他們幾個還是老樣子啊。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7328.en:
<voice 01435_00007328><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Yo, <pc>. I've decided to leave the village,
too.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7328.ja:
<voice 01435_00007328><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「よう　<pc>。
　オレも　村を出ることにしたぜ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7328.ko:
<voice 01435_00007328><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 어이, <pc>.
　나도 마을을 떠나기로 했다.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7328.zh-Hans:
<voice 01435_00007328><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>哟，<pc>。
我也决定离开村子了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7328.zh-Hant:
<voice 01435_00007328><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>嗨，<pc>，
我也決定離開村子了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7329.en:
<voice 01465_00007329><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>I don't need any Mark of Adulthood.
I'll use my own strength to make a
name for myself in the big towns.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7329.ja:
<voice 01465_00007329><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「一人前の証なんか　もういらねえ。
　オレは　オレ自身のチカラで
　デカい町で　のしあがってやる。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7329.ko:
<voice 01465_00007329><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 모험가의 증표 같은 건 이제 필요 없어.
　나는 나 자신의 힘으로
　큰 마을에서 높은 자리에 올라갈 거야.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7329.zh-Hans:
<voice 01465_00007329><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>合格者的证明什么的不要也罢。
我要凭自己的实力
在大城市闯出一片天地。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7329.zh-Hant:
<voice 01465_00007329><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我已經不需要合格者之證了。
我要憑我自己的力量，
在大市鎮裡爬上高位。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7330.en:
<voice 01510_00007330><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>I'm sure we'll meet
again somewhere, someday.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7330.ja:
<voice 01510_00007330><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「お前とは　いつか　どこかで
　会うこともあるだろうさ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7330.ko:
<voice 01510_00007330><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 너와는 언제 어디선가
　다시 만날 수도 있겠지.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7330.zh-Hans:
<voice 01510_00007330><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>或许有一天，
我们还会在哪里见面吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7330.zh-Hant:
<voice 01510_00007330><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我相信總有一天，
我和你也會在某處見面吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7331.en:
<voice 01540_00007331><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Maybe we'll have changed so much
that we won't recognize each other.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7331.ja:
<voice 01540_00007331><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「もしかしたら　会っても気づかねえほど
　お互い　変わっているかもしれないがな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7331.ko:
<voice 01540_00007331><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 어쩌면 만나도 알아보지 못할 만큼
　각자 변해 있을지도 모르지만.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7331.zh-Hans:
<voice 01540_00007331><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>说不定到那时，
我们都变得认不出对方了呢。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7331.zh-Hant:
<voice 01540_00007331><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>說不定到時我們都有很大的變化，
即使見了面也認不出來喔。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7332.es: <voice 01656_00007332><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>¡Hasta la vista, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7332.ja: <voice 01656_00007332><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「じゃあな　<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
7332.ko: <voice 01656_00007332><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 잘 가라, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

7342.en: <pc> read the words on the stone memorial.
7342.es: <pc> leyó las palabras grabadas en la ofrenda.
7342.ja: <pc>は　慰霊碑に書かれた文字を読んだ。

7343.en:
May eternal happiness and rest
find the sorrowful groom who returned
to the mother sea...
7343.ja:
母なる海に還りし　悲しき花婿に
永遠の幸せと　安息を与えたまえ。
7343.ko:
어머니 바다로 돌아간 슬픈 신랑에게
영원한 행복과 안식을 주소서.
7343.zh-Hans:
请将永远的幸福与安息赐予
返回大海母亲怀抱的悲伤的新郎吧。
7343.zh-Hant:
悲傷的新郎，回歸大海母親的懷抱，
請賜予他永恆的幸福與安息。

7344.en: <pc> read the words on the stone memorial.
7344.es: <pc> leyó las palabras grabadas en la ofrenda.
7344.ja: <pc>は　石碑に書かれた文字を読んだ。

7345.en:
May eternal happiness and rest
find the sorrowful couple who returned
to the mother sea...
7345.ja:
母なる海に還りし　ひと組の夫婦に
永遠の幸せと　安息を与えたまえ。
7345.ko:
어머니 바다로 돌아간 한 쌍의 부부에게
영원한 행복과 안식을 주소서.
7345.zh-Hans:
请将永远的幸福与安息赐予
返回大海母亲怀抱的一对夫妇吧。
7345.zh-Hant:
一對夫妻，回歸大海母親的懷抱，
請賜予他們永恆的幸福與安息。
